Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you again for your call, you've made our day too! You have a wonderful day as well.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Zentron Support, you're with Leo. This call may be recorded.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I just placed an order, and the total seems wrong. I think I've been overcharged.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I can certainly look into that for you. Can you please provide the order number?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: ZN-TAX-SURPRISE.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. I see your order for the headphones, which are priced at $99.99. What was the total you were charged?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: It was $108.49. Why is that?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Let me check the breakdown of the charge for you... The subtotal for the item was $99.99, and then an 8.5% sales tax was applied based on your shipping address, which comes to $8.50. That brings the total to $108.49.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Oh, I forgot about tax. I just looked at the price on the page.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: It's an easy thing to overlook! The sales tax is calculated and shown on the final checkout page before you confirm your payment. I can confirm the charge is correct.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay, that's my mistake then. Thanks for clarifying.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: You're very welcome. Happy to help.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: GloboMart, this is Jessica. How may I help you?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I'm trying to buy a TV from you, and I want to use the monthly payment option. Can you explain that?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Of course. Our EMI plans let you pay for the TV over a period of time, like 12 or 24 months, using a credit card.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Does my bank offer that? I have a Capital One card.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Let me check for that specific TV... Yes, Capital One is one of our partners for this item. They offer a 12-month No-Cost EMI plan, which means you pay absolutely no interest.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: No interest at all? So I just pay the price of the TV divided by 12?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: That is exactly correct. The total amount you pay will be the exact price of the television. It's a very popular option.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: That's fantastic. Thank you for checking for me.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: You're very welcome. You can select that option during the payment step at checkout.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: ShopSphere Support, you're with David. This call may be recorded.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I just got my order, but you sent me the wrong thing. I ordered a blue dog collar, and I got a pink one.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I'm so sorry for that mix-up. We can definitely get the blue one sent out to you. Do you have your order number?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: SS-DOG-COLLAR.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. I see the order. I apologize for our error. I've created an exchange for you, and the correct blue collar will ship out today with express shipping.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay, great. What about the pink one?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: For an item of this value, and since it was our mistake, please don't worry about returning it. You can keep it, or perhaps donate it to a local animal shelter with our compliments.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Oh, really? That's a great idea. I'll do that. Thank you.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: You're very welcome. The correct collar will be with you in a couple of days. My apologies again.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: No problem. Thanks for making it right.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Zentron, this is Aisha. How can I help?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I'm waiting for an order, and the tracking says it was delivered, but it's not here.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I'm sorry to hear that. I can look into it. What is your order number?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: ZN-NOT-HERE.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. I see the delivery scan was about two hours ago. Did you get a chance to check with any neighbors or in less-visible spots like a back porch?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Yes, I checked with both my neighbors and looked all around my property. It's definitely not here.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay, thank you for checking. Let me see if there's a delivery photo... I don't see one. In this case, it's likely the package was either mis-scanned or stolen after delivery. I am so sorry this has happened.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I have filed a report with the courier, and more importantly, I am shipping you a replacement order right now, free of charge.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay, thank you. I was really worried I was just out the money.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Not at all. We guarantee your delivery. The new order will ship out today. If the original happens to turn up, please let us know.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: I will. Thank you for your help.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: GloboMart, this is Leo.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I'm trying to order a gift for my daughter's wedding, but I'm not sure which item to choose from her registry.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I can help you with that. A gift card is always a wonderful and flexible option. It allows the couple to purchase what they need most, or put it towards a larger item.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: That's a good idea. Can I have it sent directly to her?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Absolutely. We have two options. We can mail a physical gift card in a beautiful envelope, or we can send an e-gift card to her email address for instant delivery.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: The physical card sounds nicer for a wedding gift. Can I include a message?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Yes, of course. During the checkout process for the gift card, you'll have an option to write a personal message, which we will print on a lovely card to include with it.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: That's perfect. You've been a great help. I'll do that now.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: My pleasure. I'm sure they will very much appreciate your thoughtful gift.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: ShopSphere Customer Service. This is Fatima.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I need to know about your return policy.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I can certainly help you with that. What would you like to know?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: How long do I have to return something?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: For most items, you have 30 days from the day the item was delivered to start a return.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: And what if I don't have the box it came in anymore?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: We do ask that items are returned in their original product packaging. For example, a pair of shoes should be returned in its original shoe box. If you no longer have the outer shipping box, you can use any box or mailer bag to send it back.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay, I still have the original shoe box. That's good.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Perfect. Then you shouldn't have any problem processing the return.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Great. Thanks for the info.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: You're welcome.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Zentron, you're with Priya. This call may be recorded.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I need to close my account. I'm moving.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I can certainly help with that. Can I get the email address for the account?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: movingon@email.com.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. Before I do, are you moving internationally? We do ship to Canada and the UK.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: No, I'm staying in the US. I'm just... I have a shopping problem. I need to remove the temptation.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I understand and I completely respect that. We do have an option to 'pause' your account for 6 or 12 months. It would prevent you from logging in, but you wouldn't lose your order history in case you need it later. Would that be of interest?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: No, I think a clean break is better. Please just delete it permanently.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I understand completely. I have initiated the deletion request. You'll receive a final confirmation link to your email. Once you click it, your account will be permanently erased. We wish you the very best.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. I appreciate you understanding.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Of course. Take care.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: GloboMart Support. This is Emily speaking.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I'm looking at the 'ChefPro' stand mixer on your website, but I have a couple of questions.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I'd be happy to answer them. What would you like to know?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: What is the wattage of the motor?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Let me check the product specs... The ChefPro has a 550-watt motor. It's quite powerful.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay, that's good. And does it come with the dough hook attachment, or do I have to buy that separately?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: It comes with three standard attachments: the flat beater, the wire whip, and the dough hook. They are all included in the box.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Perfect. And last question, is the bowl dishwasher safe?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Yes, the stainless steel bowl and all three of the attachments are dishwasher safe for easy cleanup.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: You've answered all my questions. Thank you so much.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: You're very welcome. Enjoy your baking!

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: ShopSphere Support, you're with Leo.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I bought a board game from you, and when I opened it, it was missing all the player pieces.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Oh no, I'm so sorry to hear that. A game isn't much fun without the pieces. Can I get your order number?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: SS-NO-PIECES.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. I see the order for 'Castle Quest'. I apologize for the manufacturing defect. I can send you a complete, new copy of the game right away.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay, that sounds good.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: The replacement is on its way. What I'd also recommend is contacting the game's publisher directly. They often have a parts replacement service on their website. It might be quicker than returning the whole game if you just need the pieces.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: So you're sending me a new game, but I could also just get the parts?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Correct. We're happy to replace the whole thing for you. I just wanted to let you know about the other option in case it was faster. The new game is already being processed for shipment.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay, I'll stick with the full replacement then. What do I do with the one that's missing parts?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I'm sending you a free return label now. If you could send it back, we can return it to the manufacturer.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Alright, will do. Thanks.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Zentron, this is Aisha.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I just placed an order. I want to cancel it. I found it cheaper somewhere else.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I can help with that. What is the order number?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: ZN-BETTER-PRICE-4.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. I see the order for the wireless mouse. Before I cancel, would you be willing to tell me where you found it for less? We do have a price match policy.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: It's on Amazon. They have it for five dollars less, plus free shipping. Your shipping is seven dollars.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I see. Yes, it's hard to compete with their shipping model. I can certainly match the five-dollar-lower item price. While I can't waive the entire shipping fee, I can reduce it to just one dollar for you. So you'd still be saving overall.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: No, that's not good enough. I'll just get it from them. Please cancel the order.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I understand. I'm sorry we couldn't match the offer completely for you. I have successfully cancelled the order. You will not be charged.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. Bye.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: You're welcome. Have a good day.

Sub_Intent: Found a Better Price or Offer Elsewhere

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: GloboMart, this is Priya. How can I assist?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I placed an order last night, and when I woke up, I realized I really shouldn't have spent the money. I need to cancel it.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I completely understand buyer's remorse! I can help you with that. Can I have your order number?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: GM-REGRET-IT.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. I see the order for the designer handbag. It's a beautiful piece. Before I cancel, I see you have a $50 loyalty reward available on your account that wasn't applied. Would you like to apply that to the order instead? It would reduce the cost significantly.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Oh, I forgot I had that! $50 off... Hmm. That is very tempting. You know what? Yes. Let's do that. Apply the reward.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Excellent choice! I have applied your $50 reward to the order. I am also processing a partial refund for that amount back to your card. You'll get an email confirming the reward was used.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: That's fantastic. You just made my day. Thank you so much!

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I'm so glad we could make it work for you! Enjoy your new handbag.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: ShopSphere Support. This is David.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I'm trying to check out and it's not letting me complete my purchase.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I'm sorry for the trouble. What's happening when you try to pay?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: It keeps saying my zip code is invalid, but I know it's not. I live here.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay, that's a strange error. Let me check something. Is the billing address you're entering the exact same address that your credit card statements are sent to, down to the exact spelling and abbreviation?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Yes... wait. My statement goes to my P.O. Box. I'm trying to ship to my street address.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Ah, that's the issue. For payment verification, the billing address you enter must match the address your bank has on file for that card. You can still ship it to your street address.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: So I need to put my P.O. Box as the billing address?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Correct. Just check the box that says 'Shipping address is different from billing address' and enter the P.O. Box details in the billing section. It should go through then.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay, let me try that... It worked! Thank you. That was confusing.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I know it can be. It's a security measure. I'm glad we figured it out!

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Zentron, you're with Leo.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I just got my order, but you sent me the wrong book.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I'm sorry for that mix-up. Can you tell me your order number?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: ZN-WRONG-BOOK.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. I see you ordered 'The History of Rome'. What did we send you instead?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: 'A Guide to Gardening'. Not quite the same thing.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Not at all. I am so sorry for that error. I've already created a new order to ship the correct book to you today with express shipping.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay, thank you. What do I do with this gardening book?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Please keep it with our apologies. Maybe you'll discover a new hobby! There's no need to return it.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Oh, okay. Thank you. That's very nice.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: It's the least we can do. Your correct book will be with you shortly.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: GloboMart, this is Ben speaking. This call may be recorded.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I forgot my password and I'm not getting the reset email.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I'm sorry you're having trouble. Can you tell me the email address you're using to log in?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: myemail@gmail.com.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. Have you checked your spam folder and also the 'Promotions' tab in Gmail? Sometimes our emails get filtered there.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Yes, I've checked everywhere. It's not there.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay. I've just manually triggered another reset link to be sent from our system. Can you please refresh your inbox and check again for me?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Still nothing. This is so annoying.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I understand. This can sometimes happen if an email provider is temporarily blocking our server. Would you like me to try sending the reset link via SMS to the phone number on your account instead?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: You can send it to my phone? Yes, let's try that.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay. I've just sent the secure reset link to the number ending in 5555. Did you receive a text message?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Yes! I just got it. Perfect. Thank you so much.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I'm so glad that worked. Sorry for the trouble with the email.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: ShopSphere Loyalty. This is Maria. How can I help?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I made a purchase a couple of days ago, and I don't see the points in my account.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I can check on that for you. What is your email address?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: no.points@email.com.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. I see your recent order for the skincare set. Let me check the points ledger... It looks like the points are in your account, but they are in a 'pending' status.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: What does 'pending' mean?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: It means the points are allocated to you, but they won't become available for you to spend until after the return period for the item has passed, which is 30 days. This is to prevent points from being spent on an item that is later returned.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: So I have to wait a month to get my points?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: That's correct. It's an automated part of our loyalty system. You will see them move to 'available' 30 days after your item was delivered.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Oh. I didn't know that. Okay, thanks for explaining.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: You're very welcome.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Zentron. This is David.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I just submitted a return online, and now I'm trying to check the status, but I can't find it anywhere.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I can help you with that. Can you give me the original order number?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: ZN-RETURN-STATUS.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. I see you initiated the return for the sweater just about 15 minutes ago. It can sometimes take up to an hour for the return information, including the return tracking number, to fully populate in our system.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Oh, so it's just too soon?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Exactly. The system is just catching up. I can confirm on my end that the return was successfully initiated. The return label has been sent to your email, and if you check your account's 'Returns' section again in about an hour, you should see all the status details there.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay, that's fine. I just wanted to make sure it went through. Thanks.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Not a problem at all. Happy to confirm it for you.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: GloboMart, you're with Aisha. This call may be recorded.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I ordered a set of four placemats, but only three were in the package.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I'm so sorry to hear that an item was missing. I can help you with that. Can I have your order number?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: GM-SHORTED-ME.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. I see the order for the set of four. I sincerely apologize for that packing error. I can process a partial refund for 25% of the cost to cover the missing placemat.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: I don't want a refund, I want the fourth placemat. I need a set of four.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I understand. Let me check... Unfortunately, this item is sold as a pre-packaged set, so we don't have individual placemats to send out. The only way to get you the fourth one would be to send you a whole new set.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay, then do that.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Certainly. I have placed an order for a new set of four to be sent to you. I'm also emailing you a return label. If you could please send the incomplete set of three back to us, we'd appreciate it.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay, that works. Thank you for fixing it.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: You're welcome. My apologies for the inconvenience.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: ShopSphere Support, this is Ben speaking.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hello, I just placed an order and I want to cancel it. The shipping is going to take too long.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I'm sorry to hear the delivery estimate isn't working for you. Can I get your order number?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: SS-TOO-SLOW.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. I see you selected our free standard shipping, which has an estimate of 7-10 days. I can still cancel this order for you. Before I do, I wanted to let you know that we also offer a 2-day priority shipping option for $10. Would you like me to cancel this so you can re-order with the faster shipping?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: No, I don't want to pay for shipping. I'll just get it from somewhere else. Please cancel.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I understand. No problem at all. I have successfully cancelled your order. You will not be charged. You'll receive a cancellation confirmation by email.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: You're welcome. We're sorry we couldn't meet your needs this time.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Zentron, this is Emily. How can I assist you?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I just placed an order and I didn't get my 'first time order' discount. I forgot to put the code in.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I'm sorry you missed that! I can help you with it. Can you give me your order number?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: ZN-FORGET-CODE-1.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. I see your order. Unfortunately, our system doesn't let us add a coupon code after the order is confirmed.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: So there's nothing you can do?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I can't change that order, but what I can do is just as good. The coupon was for 15% off, which would have been a savings of $12 for you. I am issuing a $12 refund back to your payment method to match the discount you missed.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Oh! You can just refund me the amount? That's perfect!

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Yes, absolutely. We want to make sure you get the deals we offer. The refund has been processed and will appear on your statement in a few business days.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: That is excellent service. Thank you so much, Emily.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: You're very welcome. Enjoy your order!

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: GloboMart Support. This is Ken.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I'm just calling to say that I love the new feature on your website where you can see a product in your room with your phone camera. It's so cool!

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: That's fantastic! Thank you so much for calling to tell us that. That's our new Augmented Reality feature, and we're so glad you're enjoying it.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: I used it to buy a new armchair, and it was so helpful to see if the color and size would work in my living room before I bought it. It's a game-changer.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: That's exactly what we hoped it would be used for! I will be sure to pass your wonderful feedback on to our app development and web design teams. They will be so motivated to hear it.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Please do! It's brilliant. That's all, have a good day.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you again for your call. You have a great day too!

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you for calling Zentron support, Alex speaking. How can I help?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I just got my credit card bill and there are two charges from you for the same amount. I only ordered one thing.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I'm sorry to hear that. I can definitely look into it and get it straightened out. Do you have your order number?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: The order is ZN-PAY-TWICE.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. I'm pulling it up now... Okay, I see your order for the wireless mouse. On our side, I can confirm we only have one successful transaction. I do, however, see a second *attempt* that failed moments before the successful one.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: But my bank shows two charges. They both came out.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I understand it looks that way. What you're likely seeing is one actual charge and one temporary authorization hold from the failed attempt. That hold will fall off your statement automatically, usually in a couple of business days. It's not a true second charge.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: So one of them will just go away on its own?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Exactly. Your bank can confirm this for you as well. I'm sorry for the alarm it caused.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay, that's a relief then. As long as I'm not actually paying for two.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: You are not. Your order is all correct on our end.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: ShopSphere, this is Maria. This call may be recorded.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I'm tracking my package and it says it's out for delivery. Can you tell me what time it might get here?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I can certainly check that for you. What is your order number?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: SS-ETA-PLEASE.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. Yes, I see it's on the truck for delivery today. That's exciting! Unfortunately, the couriers can't provide a specific time window. They deliver anytime between 8 AM and 9 PM.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Oh, really? No window at all? I was hoping to run some errands.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I understand. Sometimes on the courier's own tracking website, they have a live map feature that might give you a better idea of where the driver is on their route. Have you tried checking there directly?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: No, I'm just looking at your site. I'll try the courier's site.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: That would be your best bet for a more detailed estimate. But I can confirm it is on its way to you today.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay, thanks for the tip. I'll go look there.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: You're welcome. Enjoy your order!

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: OmniBuy customer service, Leo speaking.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I just got an order confirmation for something I didn't buy. A very expensive watch.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay, I'm very sorry to hear that. Let's act quickly. What is the email address on your account?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: my.email@web.net.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. I'm accessing your account now... Yes, I see an order for a smartwatch placed 10 minutes ago, shipping to a different state. I am cancelling this fraudulent order immediately... Okay, the order is cancelled. You have not been charged.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Oh thank goodness. How did this happen?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: It appears your account credentials were compromised. I've placed a temporary lock on your account and logged out the unauthorized user. I've also deleted the fraudulent shipping address they added.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: This is so stressful.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I understand. The situation is contained. I am now sending a secure password reset link to your email. Please use it to create a new, strong password, and consider enabling two-factor authentication for much greater security.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: I will. Thank you so much for your fast help.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: It's our pleasure. We're here to keep you safe.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: NovaCart support, you're with Aisha.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I was trying to make a purchase and it failed, but my card was still charged. I want to cancel whatever that was.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I'm sorry for the confusion. I can clarify what happened. Can you give me your account email?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: user@email.com.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. I can see in our system that you attempted to place an order, but the transaction was ultimately declined by the payment processor. There is no active order to cancel.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: But the money is gone from my account.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I understand it looks that way. The charge you're seeing is a temporary hold, or a 'pending' transaction. Because the order failed, that hold will be automatically released by your bank and the money will be returned to your balance. It was never permanently captured by us.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: How long does that take?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: It's usually very fast, within 24 hours, but can sometimes take up to 3 business days depending on the bank.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay. So I just wait. Fine. Thanks for explaining.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: You're welcome. I'm sorry for the inconvenience.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Hello, you've reached Zentron. This is Chloe. How can I help?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I need to get a receipt for an order I made last month for my taxes.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I can definitely help with that. Do you happen to have the order number?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: I don't, I'm sorry. It was for a desk chair.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: No problem. I can find it using your email address. Is that okay?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Sure, it's my.name@work.com.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. Give me a moment to search... Ah, yes. I see an order for the 'Ergo-Chair 3000' on June 5th. Is that the one?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: That's it!

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Perfect. I can email a PDF copy of the full tax invoice to you right now. Is the same email address, my.name@work.com, the right place to send it?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Yes, please.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay, the email is on its way. You should have it in your inbox any second now.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Just got it. This is exactly what I needed. Thank you!

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: You're very welcome.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: ShopSphere customer care, you're with David.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I'm looking at your payment plans for a new phone. Can you explain how it works?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Of course. Our EMI plans allow you to pay for your phone in equal monthly installments using a credit card from one of our partner banks, instead of paying the full amount upfront.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: And are there any extra charges for that? Like interest?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: For the 'No-Cost EMI' plans, there are no interest charges at all. The total amount you pay over the 6 or 12 months is exactly the same as the phone's price tag.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: That sounds great. So I just select that option at checkout?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: That's correct. On the payment page, you'll choose 'EMI', then select your bank and the tenure you prefer. The monthly payment amount will be clearly displayed before you confirm.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay, sounds easy enough. Thanks for the clarification.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: You're very welcome. Enjoy your new phone!

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you for calling OmniBuy. This is Priya. This call may be recorded.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I ordered a set of drinking glasses and one of them is completely shattered.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Oh, I'm so sorry to hear that. It must have been damaged in transit. I can help with that. Can you provide the order number?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: OM-SHATTERED.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. I see the order for the set of four glasses. I'm very sorry one was broken. I can either send you a whole new set of four, or I can give you a 25% refund for the one broken glass. What would you prefer?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: I don't really need a whole new set, the other three are fine. A refund for the broken one is perfect.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay, I can certainly do that. I have processed a refund for 25% of the item's price back to your original payment method.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Great. Do I need to send back the broken pieces or anything?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Oh no, please don't! For your safety, just dispose of the broken glass carefully. There's no need to return it.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay, good. Thank you for your help.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: You're welcome. My apologies again for the damage.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: NovaCart support, Leo speaking. This call may be recorded.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I bought a sweater a couple of months ago, and I've never worn it. The tags are still on. Can I return it?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I can check that for you. Do you have the order number?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: I do. It's NC-OLD-ORDER.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. Let me see... I show this was delivered 72 days ago.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Yeah, I know it's been a while. Is there any chance at all?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I'm very sorry, but our return policy is a firm 30 days. After that, the system won't even allow me to generate a return authorization. I'm afraid I'm unable to process a return for this item.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Really? Nothing at all? Not even store credit?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I'm afraid not. The window for any kind of return, even for credit, closes after 30 days. I truly apologize.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Wow. That's really inflexible. I've been a customer for years. I guess I'm stuck with it then.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I am very sorry. I wish I had a different answer for you.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Yeah, me too. Okay, thanks anyway. Bye.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Goodbye. I'm sorry I couldn't help further.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: This is Zentron, Maria speaking. How can I assist?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I just got a shirt I ordered and it's huge on me. I need to exchange it for a smaller size.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: No problem at all. We can help with that. What's your order number?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: ZN-TOO-BIG.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. I see you ordered the polo shirt in size Large. What size do you need instead?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: I definitely need a Medium.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay, let me check the stock for the Medium... Yes, it's available. I've created the exchange order for you, so the Medium shirt is on its way.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: That's great. What about this one?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I've sent a free return shipping label to your email. Just pack up the Large shirt, apply the label, and drop it in the mail at your convenience.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Perfect, that's easy. Thanks for your help.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: You're very welcome. The new size should fit much better!

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: ShopSphere, you're with Ben. How can I help?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I tried to use a coupon code, 'SAVE10', and it said it was invalid.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I can look into that for you. The SAVE10 code is a one-time use coupon for new subscribers to our newsletter. Have you perhaps used it on a previous order?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Oh... I might have. I'm not sure. I've ordered before.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Let me check your account... Yes, it looks like that code was redeemed on your first order with us about six months ago. Since it's a one-time use code, it can't be applied again.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Oh, okay. I didn't realize. Are there any other codes I can use?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Let me see... There aren't any site-wide promotions running today, but I see you have 500 loyalty points available, which you could redeem for a $5 discount.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Oh, I'll do that then! How do I use them?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: At checkout, there's a box to apply your loyalty points. Just type '500' in there and it will take $5 off your total.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Great, thanks for finding that for me.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Happy to help!

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: OmniBuy support, this is Priya. How may I help?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I need to change the primary address on my account. I've moved.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I can certainly help you with that. For security, I'll just need to verify some information. Can you tell me the email address on the account?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: mover@email.com.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. And can you confirm the old address that's currently on file?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: It's 123 Old Street.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Perfect, that matches. What is the new address you'd like to set as your primary?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: It's 456 New Avenue, Anytown, 54321.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay, 456 New Avenue. I have updated your default shipping and billing address. Is there anything else I can help with?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: No, that's it. Thank you for making it so easy.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: You're very welcome. Enjoy your new home!

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: This is NovaCart support, how can I help you?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I just placed an order and I immediately regret it. I can't afford it right now.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I understand. Let's see if we can cancel that for you. Do you have the order number?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: NC-REGRET.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. I see the order for the new sound system. That is a big purchase. Let me check the status... Okay, it was just placed, so it's not yet with the warehouse. I can cancel it for you.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Oh, please do. Thank you.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Before I do, are you sure? I see you're using our monthly payment plan. The first payment isn't for another month, which might make it more manageable.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: That's why I bought it, but... no. It's still not a good idea for me right now. Please cancel.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I respect your decision. I am processing the cancellation now... All done. The order is cancelled, and you will not be charged.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. I really appreciate it.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: You're welcome. We'll be here when the time is right.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you for calling ShopSphere. My name is Aisha.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I just checked out and the discount code I got in an email didn't work. I forgot to apply it, actually. Can you help?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I can certainly try! What is your order number?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: SS-FORGOT-DISCOUNT.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. And what was the code you intended to use?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: It was 'SPECIAL15' for 15% off.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay, I see your order and I can confirm that was a valid code for the items you purchased. Since the order has already been paid for, I can't alter it, but I can refund you the difference.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Oh, that would be great!

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Yes, 15% of your total comes to $9.45. I have just processed that amount as a refund back to your credit card.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: That's fantastic. Thank you so much for doing that.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: It's my pleasure. We want to make sure you get the best price possible. The refund will appear in a few days.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Thanks, Aisha.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Zentron support, you're with Leo. This call may be recorded.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, do you have any deals for new customers?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Yes, we do! If you're placing your first order with us, you're eligible for our welcome discount.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Oh, great! What is it?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: You can get 15% off your entire first order. All you need to do is subscribe to our email newsletter, and the code will be sent to your inbox instantly.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: And where do I subscribe?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: If you scroll to the bottom of any page on our website, there's a box where you can enter your email address. It's as simple as that.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay, I'll do that. Does the discount work on sale items too?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I'm afraid it's only valid on full-priced items. The terms are listed in the email you'll receive.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay, that's fine. Thanks for the information.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: You're very welcome. We hope you enjoy your first purchase with us.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: OmniBuy customer service, this is Priya.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi Priya, can you tell me what my loyalty points balance is?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I can certainly do that. Can you give me the email address for your account?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: It's my.email@email.com.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. Pulling that up now... Okay, I see you have a balance of 3,210 points.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: 3,210. So that's thirty-two dollars and ten cents, right?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: You got it! You have a $32.10 credit ready to be used.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Great! I'm about to place an order, so that's perfect. Thanks for checking for me.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: You're very welcome. Enjoy the discount!

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you for calling NovaCart. You're with Ben.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hello, I just bought a new laptop from you, and my reward points haven't been added to my account.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I can check on that. Can I get your order number?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: NC-LAPTOP-POINTS.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. I see the order was just delivered this morning. Congratulations on the new laptop!

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Thanks. But where are the points?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Our system is set up to credit loyalty points 24 hours *after* a successful delivery. This is to ensure the order isn't cancelled or refused.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Oh, so it's not instant?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Correct. It's just on a 24-hour delay. You should see the points appear in your account by tomorrow morning. I can assure you they are pending and will be credited.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay, that makes sense. I was just worried there was a problem.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: A very common question! No problem at all. They'll be there for you soon.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Alright, great. Thank you.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: You're welcome.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Zentron support, you're speaking with Chloe.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I have a lot of reward points on my account. How do I use them to pay for something?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: That's a great question. You can apply them as a discount during the final step of checkout.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay, I'm at the checkout page now. I see my total, but I don't see anywhere to put points.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: If you look down the page, right above the large button that says 'Place Your Order', there should be a dropdown or a box labeled 'Use My Zentron Points'.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Ah, I see it now. It was collapsed. So I just type in the amount I want to use?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Exactly. You can type in the number of points you wish to redeem, and you will see the total price of your order decrease accordingly.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Perfect. That's exactly what I needed. Thank you.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: You're very welcome. Enjoy your savings!

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: ShopSphere customer support. This is Ken.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I just got an order, and the main item is missing. The box was sealed, but it's just not there.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I am so sorry to hear that. That is a major error on our part. Can I please have your order number?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: SS-EMPTY-BOX.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. I see you ordered a smartwatch and a charging cable. You're saying the watch itself is missing?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Yes! The cable is here, but the watch, the main thing, is gone.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I am looking at the weight of the package recorded by the courier, and it's far too light. This confirms a packing error at our warehouse. I am so, so sorry. This is unacceptable.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: So what are you going to do?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I am immediately processing a full refund for the entire order, for both the watch and the cable. And I am also shipping you a brand new smartwatch, free of charge, with our fastest shipping. Please keep the cable that you received.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Wait, a full refund AND you're sending me a new watch for free?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Yes. This was a significant failure, and we want to do everything we can to make it right and apologize for the mistake.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Wow. Okay. That's... amazing customer service. Thank you.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: You're welcome. Your new watch will be with you in 1-2 days.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Hello, OmniBuy customer support. You're with Maya.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I ordered a set of three picture frames, and only two arrived.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I'm very sorry about the incomplete order. I can help with that. Do you have the order number?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: OM-ONE-MISSING.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. I see the order for the set of 3 'Rustic Wood' frames. My apologies for the error. I can send you the single missing frame right away.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay, that would be great.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Let me just check our inventory... Oh, it appears that item is now out of stock as a single unit, we only sell it as a set of 3.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: So you can't send me the one I'm missing?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I can't, and I'm very sorry. The best I can do is process a refund for one-third of the purchase price to compensate you for the missing frame.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: So I just get some money back and I'm stuck with two frames? That doesn't really help me.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I understand. The other option is you can return the two frames you have for a full refund. I can send you a free return label.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: This is so annoying. Fine. Just give me the partial refund. I'll figure something out.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay. I have processed that refund for you. I am very sorry we couldn't resolve this better for you.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you for calling Zentron. You're with Chloe.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi Chloe, I ordered a book from you. Order number ZN-WRONG-BOOK. You sent me the wrong one.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Oh, I'm so sorry about that packing mistake. I can get that fixed for you. What book did you order and what did you receive?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: I ordered the new Stephen King novel, and I got a copy of 'Pride and Prejudice'.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Wow, those are very different! My apologies. I'm looking now and the Stephen King book is in stock. I'm sending the correct book to you immediately with priority shipping.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay, thank you. What should I do with Jane Austen?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: As an apology for our error, please feel free to keep it. Maybe you'll enjoy it, or you can pass it on to a friend. There's no need to return it.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Oh, really? I can just keep it? That's nice of you.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Of course. It was our mistake. Your correct book will be with you very soon.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Well, thank you very much.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: You're most welcome.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: NovaCart support, Aisha speaking. This call may be recorded.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I'm closing all my online accounts. I'd like to delete mine with you.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I can certainly do that for you. Can you provide the email address for the account?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: It's privacy.first@email.com.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. Just to confirm, this is a permanent action and cannot be undone. All your data, including order history, will be erased.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Yes, that's what I want.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay. Before I finalize it, may I ask why you're leaving? It helps us understand our customers better.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: I'm just reducing my digital footprint. Nothing against you guys specifically.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: A very understandable goal. Alright, I have submitted the deletion request. You will receive one final email confirming that the process has begun.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you very much.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: You're welcome. All the best.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you for calling ShopSphere. You're with Leo.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi Leo, I need an invoice for my last purchase. The order number is SS-NEED-PROOF.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Not a problem. I can email that to you. I'm pulling up the order now... I see it's for the wireless earbuds.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: That's the one. I need it for a warranty claim.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I understand. I am resending the official invoice to the email address we have on file for you. It should have all the details you need.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay, let me check... yep, it just arrived.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Great. Does that look like what you need? It has the date of purchase, item, and price.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Yes, this is perfect. It has the serial number and everything. Thank you for being so quick.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Happy to help. Good luck with your warranty claim!

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Zentron support, Chloe speaking.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I just bought a new router from you, order ZN-ROUTER-HELP. Can I pay for it over a few months?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: That's a great question. Unfortunately, the order has already been completed as a full, one-time payment. The option to use an EMI installment plan must be selected *during* the checkout process.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Oh, so it's too late?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: From our end, yes. However, some credit card companies allow you to convert a recent large purchase into an EMI plan directly with them. You would have to call the number on the back of your card and ask if they can do that for this transaction.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: So I have to call my bank?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: That's correct. They would be the ones to set it up for you after the fact. I'm sorry we can't do it from our side once the order is complete.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay, that's good to know. I'll give them a call and see what they say. Thanks for the tip.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: You're very welcome. I hope they're able to help you out.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Hello, OmniBuy customer support. You're with Maya.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I'm looking at the 'Pro-Chef' knife set on your website. Can you tell me if the knives are full tang?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: That's an excellent, specific question. Let me check the detailed product specifications for you. One moment...

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Yes, I can confirm that all the knives in the Pro-Chef set, except for the small paring knife, are forged from a single piece of steel and are full tang for better balance and durability.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: That's great. And what kind of steel is it?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: They are made from high-carbon German stainless steel, X50CrMoV15 to be exact.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Wow, you know your stuff. Okay, one last question. Is the wood block made of real wood?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Yes, it's a solid block of acacia wood.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: You've been incredibly helpful. I'm going to buy it right now. Thank you.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: My pleasure! It's a fantastic set. I'm sure you'll be very happy with it.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you for calling ShopSphere. You're with David.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I want to buy a gift for my sister's baby shower. Can I have it sent directly to her and have it wrapped?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Absolutely! We can do all of that for you.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: How does it work?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: When you are checking out, you'll enter your sister's name and address as the 'Shipping Address'. Then, there will be a checkbox that says 'This order is a gift'. Once you check that box, you'll see options for gift wrapping and for adding a free personalized message.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: That's so convenient. And she won't see the price, will she?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Correct. We will include a gift receipt in the box, which has all the item information in case she needs to exchange it, but it has no pricing on it.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: This is perfect. It's going to save me a trip to the post office. Thank you.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: You're very welcome. Congratulations to your sister!

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: NovaCart support, Ken speaking.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I just placed an order, NC-WRONG-ITEM, but I clicked the wrong thing. I ordered the wrong model of phone charger.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I understand, with so many models it's an easy mistake to make. Let's see if we can catch it before it ships. I'm looking up your order now...

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay, it was just placed, so I can still cancel it for you. This will allow you to place a new order for the correct charger.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Oh, great. Please cancel it.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I'm processing the cancellation now... One moment... Okay, order NC-WRONG-ITEM has been successfully canceled. You will not be charged.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Phew. That's a relief. Thank you. I'll go find the right one now.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: You're welcome. Just be sure to double check the model number this time!

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: I will! Thanks again.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Hello, Zentron support. You're with Priya.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I just got an email about your 'Mid-Year Sale'. I want to know if the headphones I want are included.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I can check that for you. Which headphones are you interested in?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: The Z-Sound 500 model.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Let me check the sale's terms and conditions... Okay, I see that the Mid-Year Sale applies to most home and audio equipment, but it does have an exclusion for 'new release' items from the last 60 days. The Z-Sound 500 was just released last month, so I'm afraid it's not eligible for this particular discount.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Oh, that's a shame. So I can't get any discount on it?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Not with this specific sale, I'm sorry. New release products are rarely discounted so soon after launch.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay. That's disappointing, but thanks for checking for me so I didn't waste my time trying to apply the code.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: You're welcome. I'm sorry it wasn't the answer you were hoping for.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you for calling OmniBuy. You're with Leo.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I just placed an order and I realized I found the same item cheaper on another site. Can I cancel?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I understand wanting the best price. Let me see what I can do. What's your order number?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: OM-CHEAPER.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. I see the order for the air fryer. The order has already been sent to the warehouse, so I'm unable to cancel it.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: So now I have to go through the whole return process? Ugh.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I know that's a hassle. While we don't have an official price matching policy, I'd like to help. How much cheaper was it on the other site?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: It was fifteen dollars cheaper.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay. To save you the trouble of a return and to show our appreciation for your business, I'm going to issue you a $15 refund to match that price. Would that work for you?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: You can just do that? Yes, that would be perfect. Thank you!

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Excellent. I've processed that partial refund for you. We're happy we could keep your order with us.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: That's great service. Thanks, Leo.

Sub_Intent: Found a Better Price or Offer Elsewhere

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: ShopSphere customer support, Alex speaking.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I just moved and I need to update my address in my profile.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I can certainly help you with that. To verify your account, can you please tell me the email address and phone number currently on file?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: It's my_old_address@email.com and the number is 555-111-2222.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Perfect, thank you. What is the new primary address you'd like me to save for you?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: 789 New Street, Apartment 10B, Sometown, 13579.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay, I have updated your default shipping address to 789 New Street, apartment 10B. Is there any other information you needed to change?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: No, that was it. Thanks for your help.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: You're very welcome. Just remember if you have any active subscriptions, you may need to update the address on those individually.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Good tip. Thank you.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you for calling Zentron. You're with Maya.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi Maya, I'm calling to give a compliment. I had an issue with a delivery last week and the agent I spoke with, I think his name was Ben, was just absolutely wonderful.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Oh, that's so great to hear! We love getting this kind of feedback. I can definitely look up that interaction.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Please do. He was so patient and fixed my problem instantly. He's a real asset to your team.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I am so happy to hear he provided such great service. I have found the record of your call with Ben, and I will be forwarding this praise directly to him and to his team lead. It really makes a difference.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Good. I just wanted to make sure his good work was recognized.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: We appreciate it more than you know. Thank you for taking the time to call us back.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: No problem at all. Have a great day.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: You too!

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: NovaCart support, Maria speaking.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I just got a package from you guys and it's the wrong thing. I ordered a dog bed, and you sent me a cat tree.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Oh my. I am so sorry for that very strange mix-up. Let me get this corrected for you. Can I have your order number?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: NC-PET-SWAP. I don't even own a cat.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I can certainly see how that's not helpful! I'm so sorry. I see your order for the large orthopedic dog bed. It is in stock, and I am sending the correct item out to you immediately with our fastest shipping.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay, good. What am I supposed to do with this giant cat tree?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: That was a very large and heavy mistake on our part. Please, do not worry about returning it. It would be too much of a hassle for you. I would suggest maybe posting it for free on a local community board, or donating it to an animal shelter.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: I can just keep it? It's huge!

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
