Transcript_Segments.text: Yes, please. Consider it our apology for the significant error. Your dog bed is on its way.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Huh. Okay, I guess I'll donate it. Thank you for fixing this.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: You're most welcome. My sincerest apologies again.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: OmniBuy customer care. You're speaking with Ken.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi there. I have an order that was supposed to arrive yesterday, but the tracking just says 'Delivery Exception'. What does that mean?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I can look into that for you. That message can mean a few different things. What's your order number?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: OM-EXCEPTION.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. Let me check the detailed tracking notes from the courier... Ah, I see. The note says 'Access to property blocked'. Was there a gate closed or perhaps road work on your street yesterday?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Oh, you know what, they were repaving our street all day. The whole road was blocked off.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: That would be it then. The driver was unable to get to your address. In these cases, they will automatically re-attempt delivery on the next business day. So you should expect them to try again today.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay, the road is open today. So they'll just bring it today?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Yes, that's the standard procedure. It should be on the truck for delivery again today.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: That's a relief. I was worried it was lost. Thanks for clarifying.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: You're very welcome. Sorry for the one-day delay!

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you for calling ShopSphere. My name is Maria.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I have a question about your return policy.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I'd be happy to answer it. What would you like to know?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: If I buy a dress and it doesn't fit, can I return it?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Yes, absolutely. Clothing items fall under our standard 30-day return policy. If it doesn't fit, you can return it for a full refund or exchange it for a different size.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Even if I've tried it on?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Of course. We just ask that the item is in its original, unworn condition with the tags still attached.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: And do I have to pay to ship it back?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Not at all. Return shipping is always free. We provide a prepaid label for you.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay, that's great. It gives me confidence to order. Thank you.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: You're very welcome. We want to make sure you can shop without worry.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Zentron support, you're with Aisha.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi Aisha, I need to talk to someone about my account being locked.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I can help with that. This usually happens after a few too many incorrect password attempts. Can you confirm the email address on the account for me?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: It's stuck@email.com.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. For verification, can you also give me the billing zip code?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Perfect. Thank you. I have now removed the security lockout from your account. You should now be able to go to our website and use the 'Forgot Password' link to reset your password successfully.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: So it's unlocked now? Great. I was worried.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: All unlocked. Just follow the password reset process, and you'll be back in.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you so much. You've been very helpful.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: It's my pleasure.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: NovaCart support, this is Priya.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I just shipped a return back to you. I'm calling to check on the refund.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay, do you have the return tracking number or the original order number?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: The order was NC-RETURN-STATUS.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. Let me check the status... Okay, I see the return package is in transit and is scheduled to be delivered back to our warehouse on Friday.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: So I have to wait until Friday?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: You'll have to wait until it's delivered, and then it takes our team about 1-2 business days to inspect and process it. So you can expect the refund to be issued early next week.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Wow, that takes a long time.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I understand it can feel that way. We try to process them as quickly as possible once they arrive. You will get an email notification the moment the refund is issued.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay. I guess I'll just wait for the email then. Thanks.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: You're welcome. Thank you for your patience.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Hello, this is OmniBuy Support. Ken speaking.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I have an order that was supposed to ship yesterday, but I haven't received any notification.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I'm sorry for the delay. I can look into that for you. Can I get your order number?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: OM-NO-SHIP.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. Let me check what's going on... I do apologize. It seems we had an unexpected stock shortage on the item you ordered, and it's on a brief backorder. The system should have alerted you, and I'm sorry it didn't.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: So you don't have it? When will it ship?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: We are expecting more to arrive in our warehouse tomorrow, and your order will be prioritized to ship out immediately after.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay. As long as it's just a day or two. Can you send me the tracking number when it ships?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Absolutely. You will automatically receive a shipping confirmation email with the tracking link the moment it leaves our warehouse.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay, thank you for checking.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: You're welcome. And my apologies again for the short delay.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you for calling ShopSphere. You're with Ben.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi Ben, my order says it's been delivered, but I can't find it anywhere.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I'm sorry to hear that. That's a very stressful situation. Can I have your order number?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: SS-DELIVERED-NO.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. I see the delivery confirmation from this morning. Have you had a chance to check with any neighbors, or perhaps in a less common spot like a side door?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: I've looked everywhere. It's just not here.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay. Let me check for a proof-of-delivery photo... I don't see one uploaded for this delivery, which is unusual. It's possible it was mis-delivered.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: So what do I do? Am I just out of luck?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Not at all. Since we can't confirm the delivery, we take full responsibility. I can either issue you an immediate full refund, or I can reship the entire order to you. Which would you prefer?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: I'd rather have the items. Can you reship it?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Absolutely. I've just created a new, no-charge order for you with expedited shipping. It will be on its way shortly. We will handle the investigation with the courier on our end.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you so much. That's a huge relief.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Of course. We're here to make sure you get what you paid for.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Zentron support, you're with Leo.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I just placed an order and I immediately saw the item for $25 cheaper on a different website. I want to cancel.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I understand, you want to get the best deal. Can I get your order number?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: ZN-PRICE-MATCH.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. Okay, the order was just placed so I can cancel it for you. But before I do, would you be interested if I matched that price for you? I can issue you a $25 refund to make up the difference.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: You can do that? Even though you don't advertise price matching?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: We like to keep our customers happy, and it saves you the hassle of re-ordering elsewhere. I'd be happy to do it for you.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Yes, absolutely! Let's do that instead. Don't cancel it.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Excellent. I've just processed a partial refund of $25 back to your card. Your order will ship as planned.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: That's awesome. Thank you so much, Leo.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: My pleasure. We appreciate your business.

Sub_Intent: Found a Better Price or Offer Elsewhere

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: NovaCart support, you're with Priya. This call is recorded.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I need to change my delivery address for an order I placed this morning.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay, let's see if we can catch it. What's the order number?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: NC-NEW-ADDR.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. I see the order is still in processing, so we can change it. What is the correct address?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: It's 123 Main Street, not 123 Old Street. I have both saved and I clicked the wrong one.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: An easy mistake to make! Okay, I am updating the shipping address to 123 Main Street... all set. It's been updated successfully.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Oh, what a relief. Thank you so much for fixing that.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: You're very welcome. Glad we could sort it out before it went out the door.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Me too. Thanks!

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Hello, this is OmniBuy Support. You're speaking with Chloe.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I'm trying to check out but my payment is failing. It says 'Payment method not supported'.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I'm sorry you're having trouble. I can help clarify. What type of card are you trying to use?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: It's a Discover card.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Ah, that would be the issue. I'm very sorry, but at this time, our payment processor does not accept Discover cards. We currently accept Visa, Mastercard, and American Express.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: You don't take Discover? That's the only credit card I have.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I sincerely apologize for the inconvenience. It's a limitation of our current payment gateway. Do you perhaps have a Visa or Mastercard debit card you could use instead?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: No. Wow. Okay. I guess I can't place the order then. You should really make that more clear on your site.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I will pass that feedback along to our web team immediately. I am truly sorry that we're unable to process your payment today.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Yeah, alright. Well, thanks for letting me know.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: You're welcome. I'm sorry again for the limitation.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you for calling Zentron. Maria speaking.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I just received my order, ZN-DEFECT. It's a new keyboard, and the spacebar sticks every time I press it.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I'm very sorry to hear that you've received a defective item. That's very frustrating. I can certainly get this resolved for you.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: I hope so. It's unusable like this.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I agree. I see the keyboard model here. It's in stock. I've just ordered a brand new replacement to be shipped to you today, with expedited shipping.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay, that's good. What do you need me to do with this broken one?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I've sent a prepaid return label to your email. We'd like to get that one back to our quality control team to see what went wrong. You can just drop it in the mail when you have a chance.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Alright, I can do that. Thank you for making it easy.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Of course. My apologies for sending you a faulty product.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: ShopSphere support, you're with Leo.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I got an email with a tracking number, but I deleted it by accident. Can you help me find it?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Of course. Happy to help. What is your order number?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: SS-LOST-TRACK.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. I have your order right here. The tracking number is with FedEx. I can either read it out to you, or I can resend the original shipping confirmation email.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Could you resend the email? That way I have the clickable link.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Smart thinking. I have just resent the email to the address on your account. You should see it within a minute or two.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Let me check... Yep, it just arrived. Thank you so much!

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: You're very welcome. It looks like your package is due to arrive tomorrow.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Even better! Thanks, Leo.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: NovaCart customer care, this is Chloe. This call is recorded.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hello, I want to return a coffee maker I bought last week. I just... I haven't even taken it out of the box. I don't think I'll use it.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I understand. I can help you start a return. Do you have the order number?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: The order is NC-RETURN-IT.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. I see it was delivered five days ago, so you are well within the 30-day return window. I can send you a prepaid return label right now.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay. And what's your policy on returns? I just want to be clear.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Since the item is new and in its original packaging, you will receive a full refund to your original payment method once the item is received and inspected at our warehouse.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: And return shipping is free?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Yes, completely free. The label I'm sending you is prepaid.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay, that's all I needed to know. Thank you.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: You're welcome. The return label is on its way to your email now.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: This is OmniBuy, you're speaking with Ben.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, your website is so frustrating. I'm trying to look at the different colors for a sweater, but clicking the swatches does nothing. The main image never changes.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I'm very sorry for that technical glitch. That sounds like a frustrating experience. Can you tell me the name of the sweater?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: The 'Cozy Cashmere Crewneck'.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. Let me try that on my system... You are absolutely right. The image switcher is broken. I am so sorry. I am filing a high-priority ticket with our web development team right now to get this fixed.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Well, that's great for the future, but what about now? I want to see the 'Heather Grey' color.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I understand. I can access the product images internally. If you'd like, I can email you the image file for the Heather Grey color directly.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: You can do that? Okay, yes please. My email is see-the-color@email.com.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Of course. I've just sent it over to you. I'm very sorry again for the issue with our website.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: I got it. This picture works. Thanks for finding a way to help.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: My pleasure. We appreciate you pointing out the bug to us.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you for calling Zentron. Priya speaking.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I just got an email that my account details were updated. It says my email was changed. I didn't do this.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay, that is a major security alert. Do not worry, I will handle this. What was the original email address on your account?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: It was original@email.com.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. I am immediately locking the account and reverting the email change... Okay. The fraudulent email has been removed and your original email is back in place. The account is now locked to prevent further access.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: My god, I was so scared. Did they order anything?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Let me check... No. There are no new orders. It seems we caught it before they could do any damage. I've also logged them out.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you, thank you.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Of course. To get you back in, I'm sending a password reset link to your correct email, original@email.com. Please create a new, strong password. And please, enable two-factor authentication in your profile for added security.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: I will do that right now. Thank you for your help.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: It's my top priority. Your account is now secure.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: ShopSphere customer support, you're with Leo.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, my order, SS-LATE, was supposed to be delivered two days ago. The tracking hasn't been updated. I need to cancel it.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I am so sorry for the delay. I can understand your frustration and wanting to cancel. Let me check the order...

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I see it has already shipped and is with the courier. Unfortunately, I can't recall it or cancel it once it's in their network.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: So I have to wait for an order I don't even want anymore?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I know it's not ideal. You have two options. You can refuse the delivery when it arrives, and it will be sent back to us. Or you can accept it and then use the free return label I can send you.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: This is ridiculous. I want my money back now. This is your company's fault.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I understand your frustration, sir, but the refund can only be processed once the item is confirmed to be on its way back to us. It's a system limitation to prevent fraud.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Fraud? I'm a loyal customer! This is insulting. Get me your manager.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I'd be happy to transfer you, sir. Please hold one moment while I connect you with my supervisor.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: You'd better.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you for calling NovaCart. You're with Chloe.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I just received a pair of pants and they have a hole in the pocket. It's a manufacturing defect.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I'm so sorry to hear that. That should have been caught by our quality control. I can help you with that. Do you have the order number?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: NC-HOLE.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. I see the order for the chinos. My apologies for the faulty item. Would you like a replacement pair or a full refund?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: I like the pants, so I'd like a replacement, as long as the new pair doesn't have a hole.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Of course. I've processed a new order for you with expedited shipping. I've also added a note for it to be physically inspected before packing. For the defective pair, I've sent you a free return label via email.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay, that sounds good. Thanks for your help.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: You're most welcome. Your new pair will be with you shortly. My apologies again.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: OmniBuy support, you're with Ben.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hello, I just received an order, and the size is wrong. I ordered a size 10 shoe, and you sent me a 12.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I'm so sorry for that significant packing error. I can definitely help you get the correct size. What's your order number?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: OM-WRONG-SIZE.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. I see the order for the size 10 sneakers. My apologies. Let me check the inventory for the size 10... I'm very sorry, it appears the size 10 is now completely out of stock.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: So I can't get the shoes I wanted because you guys messed up?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I'm afraid so in this particular style, and I am incredibly sorry. I can offer you a full refund, of course. I've sent a free return label for the size 12s. For this major inconvenience, I've also added a $25 credit to your account.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: This is very disappointing. I really wanted those shoes.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I know. I am very sorry. Perhaps you can find another style you like, and the credit will help with that purchase.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: I'll look. Fine. Thanks, I guess.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you for your understanding. I'm sorry again.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Zentron support, you're speaking with Leo.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I need to exchange a video game I bought. I bought the Playstation version, and I need the Xbox version.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I can help you with that. Is the game still sealed in its original plastic wrap?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Yes, I realized it was the wrong one before I opened it.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Perfect. In that case, we can do a simple exchange. Can I get your order number?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: ZN-GAME-SWAP.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. Let me check the stock on the Xbox version... Yes, we have it. I've created a new order for the Xbox version for you, and it will ship out today.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Great. What do I do with the Playstation one?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I've sent a free return label to your email. Just pop it in a mailer, attach the label, and send it back to us.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Excellent. Thanks for making that easy.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: You're welcome. Enjoy the game!

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you for calling ShopSphere. This is Priya.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I'm going to be out of town next week and I want to close my account temporarily so I don't get tempted to shop.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: That's an interesting request. We don't have an option to temporarily suspend an account, only to permanently delete it.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Oh, I don't want to delete it forever.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I understand. Might I suggest an alternative? You could simply log out of the account and delete the app from your phone for the week. Your account will still be here, safe and sound, for when you return.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: I guess I could do that. I just have no self-control.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Another option is I can help you reset your password to a random string of characters that you won't know. Then when you get back, you can call us again to go through the password reset process. That would effectively lock you out until you return.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: That's a clever idea! Let's do that. Lock me out!

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: You got it. I have just reset your password. You are now logged out and won't be able to get back in without calling us. Is that what you wanted?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Yes! Perfect. Thank you for being creative.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: You're welcome. Have a wonderful trip!

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you for calling Zentron support, Alex speaking. How can I help?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I just got my bank statement and I see a charge from you that I don't recognize. It's for $119.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I can certainly investigate that for you. Can you tell me the email address associated with your Zentron account?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: It should be annual.fee@email.com.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. I'm looking at your account now... Ah, I see the charge. It's for the annual renewal of your Zentron Prime membership, which provides free two-day shipping and other benefits.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: I didn't authorize that! I signed up for a free trial last year, I didn't know it would charge me automatically.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I understand the surprise. The terms of the free trial do mention that it converts to a paid membership. However, I can see you haven't placed any orders in the last 11 months, so you haven't used the benefits. I'd be happy to cancel the membership and issue a full refund for the renewal charge.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Oh, you can? That would be wonderful. Thank you.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Absolutely. I've cancelled the membership and processed the full refund of $119. You should see it back in your account within 3 to 5 business days.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: That's a huge relief. Thank you for making that so easy.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: It's my pleasure. We don't want customers paying for something they're not using.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: ShopSphere, this is Maria. This call may be recorded.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I'm just checking on my order. The tracking link you sent me says it's in transit, but it's been in the same city for two days.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I can take a look at the detailed tracking for you. What is your order number?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: SS-STALLED.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. Let me see... Yes, I see that it arrived at the courier's main sorting facility in Dallas two days ago. It's not unusual for packages to pause there for a day or two for processing, especially if it's a weekend.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: So it's not lost or anything?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: No, it's very unlikely. It's just in a queue waiting for its next departure scan. It's still on track to be delivered within the original estimated window, which is by this Wednesday.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay. I was just worried when I didn't see it moving.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: A very common concern. I would expect you'll see a new scan later today or tonight as it leaves that facility.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Alright, I'll keep an eye on it. Thanks for checking.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: You're welcome.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: OmniBuy customer service, Leo speaking.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I just got an alert from my credit card company about a suspicious charge from you guys for over a thousand dollars. I didn't buy anything.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay, do not worry. We will sort this out immediately. I need you to tell me the email address associated with your OmniBuy account.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: It's victim@email.com.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. I'm accessing your account with security privileges now... I see it. A new order for a laptop was placed 20 minutes ago. I am cancelling it now... The order has been cancelled and voided. You will not be charged.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank god you could stop it. I was panicking.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Your account has been compromised. I have locked the account and terminated all active sessions. The fraudulent user has been kicked out. I'm sending a password reset link to your email now. It is vital you create a very strong, unique password.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: I will, I'm doing it right now.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Excellent. I also strongly advise enabling two-factor authentication from your profile settings once you log back in. It will prevent this from happening again.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay. Thank you so much for your help.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: It's what we're here for. Your account is now secure.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: NovaCart support, you're with Aisha.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I placed an order last night, but I used the wrong address. I need to cancel it.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Let's see if we can update the address for you instead, it might be easier. What is your order number?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: NC-WRONG-PLACE.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. I see the order is still in the 'processing' stage, which is great. It means we can still change the shipping address. What is the correct address?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Oh, you can just change it? Perfect. It's 789 Pine Street, in Springfield.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay, one moment... 789 Pine Street. I have successfully updated the address in the system. The order will now ship to the correct location.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: That's a huge relief. Thank you so much for your help.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: You're very welcome. Glad we could catch it before it shipped out.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Hello, you've reached Zentron. This is Chloe. How can I help?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I need to get an official invoice for my last order.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I can help with that. Do you have the order number?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: ZN-MY-INVOICE.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. I see the order for the wireless keyboard. I can resend the PDF invoice to the email address we have on file for you. Is that okay?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Yes, please. I searched my inbox and couldn't find the original.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: No problem at all. The email has been resent. You should find it in your inbox in just a moment. Be sure to check your spam folder, just in case.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Yep, it just came through. This is perfect. Thank you.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: You're welcome. Is there anything else I can assist with?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: No, that's all. Thanks!

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: ShopSphere customer care, you're with David.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I'm looking at a pretty expensive camera. Can I pay for it over time?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Yes, for many of our higher-priced items, we offer EMI plans, which are monthly installments. You can use an eligible credit card to spread the payment over 6, 9, or even 12 months.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Is it no-cost? Or is there interest?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: If you choose one of the 'No-Cost EMI' options, the total you pay will be exactly the same as the item's price. There are no hidden fees or interest charges from us or the bank.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay, that's what I wanted to hear. Thanks for the information.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: You're very welcome. The specific options available will be shown to you on the payment page during checkout.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you for calling OmniBuy. This is Priya. This call may be recorded.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I just got a pair of headphones from you and the left ear cup has a big crack in the plastic.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Oh, I'm so sorry it arrived damaged. That's completely unacceptable. Let's get a new pair out to you. Do you have the order number?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: OM-CRACKED.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. My apologies for the damaged product. I have a replacement order all ready to go for you, with expedited shipping.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Great. What do I do with the broken ones?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I've sent a free return label to your email. We'd like to get them back to see how this damage occurred. Just pack them up and drop them in the mail.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay, I can do that. Thanks for making it right.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Of course. It's our responsibility. Your new pair will be with you shortly.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: NovaCart support, Leo speaking. This call may be recorded.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I want to return a book I bought. I already have a copy, it turns out.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I can help with that. Do you have the order number?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: NC-DUPLICATE.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thanks. Let me see... the order was delivered 40 days ago.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Yeah, I just got around to unpacking it.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I see. Unfortunately, we are outside of our 30-day window for returns. I'm sorry, but I won't be able to process a return for this item.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Are you serious? It's only ten days over. The book is in perfect condition.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I understand, but the 30-day policy is a firm cutoff in our system. I don't have the ability to override it. My apologies.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: This is ridiculous. It's a brand new book. I'm a good customer.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I can see that you are, and I'm very sorry that this is the policy. I truly wish I could do more.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Fine. I'll just sell it online myself. Thanks for nothing. *click*

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I'm sorry... customer disconnected.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: This is Zentron, Maria speaking. How can I assist?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I bought a pair of shoes from you, and they're the wrong size. Can I exchange them?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Of course. Let's get you the right size. What's your order number?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: ZN-SIZE-SWAP.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. I see you ordered the boots in size 9. Do you need a smaller or larger size?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: I need a 9 and a half. They're a bit snug.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay, let me check our inventory for the 9.5... Excellent, it's in stock. I've set up the exchange for you, so the new size will ship out today.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: That was fast. What do I do with the ones I have?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I've emailed you a prepaid return label. Just package up the size 9s and send them back to us when you can.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Perfect. Thank you for your help.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: You're very welcome.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: ShopSphere, you're with Ben. How can I help?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I can clarify that for you. The FREESHIP promotion is for orders totaling $50 or more, before tax. Can I ask what your current cart total is?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: It's $48.50. Oh, so I'm just under?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: That's correct. You're just a dollar and fifty cents away from qualifying for the free shipping.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: That's annoying. Is there anything you can do?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Unfortunately, the system is automated and I can't override the minimum spend requirement. Perhaps there's a small item, like a pair of socks or a lip balm, that you could add to your cart to get you over the threshold?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hmm. That's a good idea. It would be cheaper than paying for shipping. Let me go look.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Sounds like a plan! Let me know if you have any other questions.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Nope, that helps. Thanks.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: OmniBuy support, this is Priya. How may I help?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I need to change my phone number on my profile.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I can assist with that. To verify your identity, can you please confirm the full name and billing address on the account?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: John Doe, 123 Main Street.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you, Mr. Doe. That's correct. What is the new phone number you'd like to use?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay, 555-987-6543. I have updated the phone number on your profile.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Great. Thank you for your help.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: You're very welcome. Is there anything else I can do for you today?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: No, that's all. Bye.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: This is NovaCart support, how can I help you?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I understand having second thoughts. I can look into that for you. Do you have the order number?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: NC-SECOND-THOUGHTS.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. I see the order for the new Galaxy Tab. It is a big purchase. The order hasn't been processed by our warehouse yet, so I can cancel it for you. Are you sure you'd like me to proceed?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Yes, please. It was an impulse purchase and I just... I should wait. Please cancel it.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I completely understand. I have successfully canceled the order. The pending authorization on your card will be removed within 24 hours.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you so much. I feel much better now.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: You're very welcome. We'll be here when you're ready.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you for calling ShopSphere. My name is Aisha.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Happy birthday! Let's see what we can do. What is your order number?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: SS-BIRTHDAY.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. I see your order. And I see the 25% off birthday coupon on your account. The order has already been paid for, so I can't add it directly, but I can absolutely issue you a refund for the amount you would have saved.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: That would be perfect!

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay, 25% of your order total comes to $21.50. I have just processed that refund for you.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Wonderful! Thank you so much for your help.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: You're very welcome. I hope you have a fantastic birthday. The refund will show up in a few days.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you!

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Zentron support, you're with Leo. This call may be recorded.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hello, I'm a veteran. Do you offer a military discount?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: First of all, thank you for your service. Yes, we absolutely do. We've partnered with ID.me to provide a 10% discount for active military, veterans, and their families.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: That's great. How do I get it?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: During the checkout process, right near the coupon code box, you'll see a button that says 'Verify with ID.me'. You'll click that, and a pop-up will guide you through a quick verification process to confirm your military status.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: And that will give me 10% off my order?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Yes, once you're verified, the 10% discount will be automatically applied to your cart. It's valid on most items on our site.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: That's wonderful to hear. Thank you for supporting veterans.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: It's our honor. Thank you again for your service.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: OmniBuy customer service, this is Priya.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I just wanted to ask how many reward points I have.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I can check your balance for you. Can you tell me your email address?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: check.balance@email.com.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. Let me look that up... I'm showing a current balance of 5,450 points.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: 5,450. And that equals... fifty-four dollars and fifty cents?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: That is exactly right. You have a $54.50 credit available.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Wow, that's more than I thought! Great. That's all I needed, thank you.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: You're very welcome. Have fun shopping!

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you for calling NovaCart. You're with Ben.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I just placed a big order for my new apartment, and I don't think my points were added correctly.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I can check on that for you. Can I get your order number, please?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: NC-POINTS-WRONG.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. I see the order was just delivered today. Let me check the points transaction log... Ah, you are correct. It looks like a system error only gave you points for one of the items in your order, not the whole thing. I am very sorry about that.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: I knew it! Can you fix it?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Absolutely. You are missing 2,500 points. I am manually crediting those to your account as we speak... Okay, they should now be visible in your balance. For the trouble of you having to call us, I've also added an extra 500 bonus points.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Oh, wow, bonus points? You didn't have to do that. Thank you!

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: It was our mistake, and we appreciate your patience. I'm sorry you had to track them down.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: No problem. Thanks for fixing it so fast.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: My pleasure.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Zentron support, you're speaking with Chloe.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I have reward points and I want to use them. Can you tell me how?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Of course. It's very simple. You can apply them on the checkout page.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay, I'm there now. What do I do?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: On the final page where you confirm your order, there should be a section for 'Payment Method'. Right near there, you'll see an option to 'Apply Zentron Rewards'. You can enter the number of points you'd like to use in that box.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay, I see that. So I just type the number in and it takes the money off?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: That's exactly right. You'll see your order total update instantly before you have to click 'Place Order'.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Perfect. Thank you for the clear instructions.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: You're very welcome. Happy to help you save some money!

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: ShopSphere customer support. This is Ken.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hello, my order arrived, but it's not complete. I ordered a dinnerware set and a vase, and the vase is missing.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I'm very sorry to hear that. That shouldn't have happened. Can I have your order number?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: SS-MISSING-VASE.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. I see the two items on your order. I'm checking the shipping information... Ah, I see what happened. Because the dinnerware was a large item and the vase is fragile, they were shipped separately from different warehouses to ensure their safety. They have two different tracking numbers.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Oh! So it's coming in a different box?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: That's correct. I can see the tracking for the vase shows it's also out for delivery today and should be arriving shortly.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Oh, what a relief. I thought you guys forgot it. You should really make that more clear in the shipping email.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I completely agree, and I will pass that feedback on. I'm very sorry for the confusion and the worry it caused.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: No problem, now that I know it's coming. Thanks for checking so quickly.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: You're very welcome.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Hello, OmniBuy customer support. You're with Maya.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, you guys sent me the wrong color jacket. I ordered black and got grey.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I'm so sorry about that mix-up in our warehouse. Let's get the correct one sent to you. Do you have your order number?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: OM-GREY-NOT-BLACK.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. I see the order for the black jacket. My apologies. I'm checking now and the black one is in stock in your size. I can arrange an exchange.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Please. How does that work?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I've created the new order for the black jacket. I've also emailed you a free return label for the grey one. You can just send that back to us when you get a chance, and the new one will be on its way.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay, that sounds good. Thanks for your help.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: You're welcome. And again, my apologies for our error.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you for calling Zentron. You're with Chloe.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hello, I would like to delete my account, please.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I can certainly process that for you. We're sorry to see you go. May I ask for your reason? It's for our internal feedback.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: I created it by accident. I used the 'Sign in with Google' option and it made an account. I didn't mean to.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Ah, I see. That can happen. No problem at all, we can get that removed for you. Can you just confirm the email address that was used?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: my.google.email@gmail.com.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. I have located the brand new account and have submitted it for permanent deletion. All associated data will be removed.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Great. That was easy. Thank you.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: You're very welcome. Have a great day.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: ShopSphere Support, you're with Priya. This call may be recorded.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I just placed an order, and the delivery address is wrong. It's going to my office, but it's a personal item.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I can certainly see if we can get that changed for you. What is your order number?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: SS-WRONG-PLACE.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. Let me check the order status... I'm sorry, it looks like this one was processed very quickly and has already been passed to the courier for shipping. I can't change the address in our system anymore.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: You're kidding. It's only been 30 minutes. Now what?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Once the tracking number is active, which should be in a few hours, you can use the courier's own website to manage the delivery. They usually have an option to redirect the package to a different address or hold it at a local facility for pickup.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: So I have to deal with the courier myself? That's a pain.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I know it's an extra step, and I apologize for that. It's the fastest way to get the address changed at this point. I'll send you an email with a direct link to the courier's management page to make it easier for you.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay. Fine. Send me the link. Thanks.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I've just sent it. I'm sorry for the inconvenience.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Zentron, this is Mark. How may I help you?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hello, I want to use my loyalty points for a purchase, but I'm not sure how.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I can walk you through that. It's done on the final checkout page.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay, I'm on that page. Where do I go?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Right in the payment section, just below where you'd enter your credit card, there should be a slider bar that says 'Apply my Zentron Rewards'. It will show your current points balance.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Oh, I see it! It's right there. I just missed it.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: No problem! You can slide that bar to apply the points, and you'll see the total for your order decrease in real-time.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Perfect, it worked. Thank you for your help.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: You're very welcome. Enjoy your discount!

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: GloboMart Support, this is Fatima speaking.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I have a question about the 'EverSharp' knife set.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Certainly. What would you like to know?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Are the knives dishwasher safe?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Let me check the care instructions for you... While the manufacturer says they are technically dishwasher safe, they strongly recommend hand-washing and drying immediately to maintain the sharpness and integrity of the blade's edge.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay, so hand-washing is better. And what kind of steel are they made from?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: They are forged from high-carbon German stainless steel.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Great, that's what I was hoping. Thank you for the information.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: You're very welcome. Let me know if you have any other questions.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: ShopSphere, this is David. How can I help you?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I returned a jacket to you guys, and the tracking says you received it three days ago, but I haven't gotten my refund.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I can check on the status of that for you. Can I have the original order number?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: SS-REFUND-LATE.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. Let me look... Yes, I see we received the return. I also see the refund was issued this morning. It can take 1-2 business days for our returns team to inspect the item and process the refund after it arrives.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: So it's been issued? I don't see it in my bank account.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: That's correct. Once we issue it, it can take an additional 3-5 business days for the banking network to process the transaction and for the funds to appear on your statement. It is on its way, it just takes some time.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: So I have to wait another week? That's way too slow.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I do apologize for the processing times. The funds have left our account. You should see them appear early next week.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: This is why I hate online shopping. Fine. I'll wait.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you for your patience.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Zentron, you're with Priya. This call may be recorded.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I got a shirt as a gift, but it's too small. I want to exchange it for a bigger size.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I can definitely help with that. Do you have a gift receipt or the order number?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: No, it was just in a gift bag. I don't have any paperwork.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: No problem. Do you know the name or email of the person who bought it for you? I can try to look up the order that way.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Her name is Carol Danvers.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. One moment... I see an order from a Carol Danvers for a 'Captain Marvel' T-shirt in size Medium. Does that sound right?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Yes, that's the one! I need it in a Large.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay, let me check our stock... Yes, the Large is available. I've set up the exchange. We'll send the new size to your address, and I'll email you a return label for the Medium. Can I get your shipping address?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: It's 123 Hero Lane. Thank you so much for finding the order!

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: My pleasure! The new shirt is on its way.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: GloboMart Support, this is Leo. This call may be recorded.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I have a coupon code that isn't working.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I can look into that. What is the code?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: FREESHIP.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. And what is the subtotal of the items in your cart?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Ah, I see the issue. The FREESHIP coupon is only valid on orders with a subtotal of $50 or more.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Oh. The advertisement didn't say that.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I do apologize if the terms weren't prominent. If you were to add another $8 worth of merchandise to your cart, the code would work and you would save the $7 shipping fee.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hmm. Let me look... Okay, I added a pair of socks. Now it's over $50.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Perfect. If you try applying the FREESHIP code now, it should work for you.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: It did! Great. Thanks for your help.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: You're very welcome. Enjoy your order!

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: ShopSphere, this is Maria. How can I assist?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi Maria, I need to cancel order SS-OOPS-AGAIN. I ordered the wrong color.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I can help you with that. Let me check the order status... I see it's for the 'Comfy' throw blanket in grey.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Yes, I meant to order it in navy blue.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: No problem at all. The order hasn't shipped yet, so I can simply edit the color for you instead of cancelling the whole order. Would you like me to do that?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: You can just change it? Yes, that would be so much easier.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Consider it done. I've updated the order to the navy blue blanket. You'll receive an updated order confirmation in your email shortly.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: You're a star. Thank you so much.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Happy to help! Enjoy the blanket.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Zentron, this is Ken. This call may be recorded.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I just placed an order, and I need an invoice for it right away for my boss.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Certainly. The invoice is automatically sent to your email when the item ships, but I can generate a preliminary one for you now. Can I have your order number?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: ZN-NEED-RECEIPT-NOW.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. I have your order here. I am sending a copy of the order confirmation, which serves as a detailed receipt, to your email now. It will have the full itemized list and charges.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay, let me check... yep, I just got it. This is exactly what I need to submit. Thank you for doing that so quickly.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: You're very welcome. Glad I could help.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: GloboMart, this is Jessica. How can I help you?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I'm trying to log into my account, but it's not working. I don't think I'm getting the password reset emails.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I'm sorry you're having trouble. Let me check the status of your account. What's your email address?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: It's my.account@email.com.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. Let me see... It looks like your account has been locked. This can happen if there are too many failed login attempts.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: I did try a few times. I guess I got locked out.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Not a problem, we can fix that. To verify your identity, can you confirm the shipping address on file?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: It's 987 Birch Lane.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Perfect, that's correct. I have unlocked your account now. I'm also sending you a fresh password reset link. Please use that to set a new password, and you should be able to log right in.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay, I just got the email. Thank you so much for your help.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: You're very welcome. Glad we could get you back in.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: ShopSphere Support, this is Ben speaking.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I just checked my order status, and it hasn't shipped yet. It was supposed to ship two days ago.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I'm very sorry for the delay. Can I get your order number to check on that for you?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: SS-LATE-SHIPMENT.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. Let me see... I do see the delay. I apologize. It looks like the item was out of stock in our main warehouse, so we had to transfer it from another location. It has arrived this morning and is being processed now.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: So when will it actually ship?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: It is scheduled to ship out later today. You will receive the tracking email this evening. As an apology for the delay, I have upgraded your shipping to our 2-day express service at no extra charge.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Oh, so it will get here faster now? Okay, that's good. Thank you.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Yes, we wanted to help make up for the lost time. My apologies again.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: No problem. Thanks for the upgrade.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Zentron, this is Aisha.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I want to know my points balance.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I can help with that. What is the email on your account?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: balance.check@email.net

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. I see you have 850 points available, which is equal to an $8.50 discount.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Only 850? I thought I had more.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Let me look at your history... I see that 1000 points, or $10, expired last week due to 12 months of account inactivity. I'm sorry about that.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: They expired? I didn't know they could do that.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Yes, as per the program terms, points expire after one year of no earning or spending activity. We do send out reminder emails a month before they are set to expire.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: I probably missed the email. Can you get them back?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Unfortunately, once points have expired, I am not able to reinstate them. I do apologize.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Well, that's disappointing. Okay, thanks anyway.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: GloboMart Support. This is Emily speaking.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I have a military discount. How do I use it on your website?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you for your service! We're proud to offer a 10% discount for active duty military and veterans.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Great. So how do I get it?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: We use a secure, third-party service called ID.me to verify military status. You would need to create a free account with them one time.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: I think I already have one of those. I used it for another store.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Perfect, then you're all set. At our checkout, just click on the button that says 'Verify with ID.me'. Log in to your account there, and the discount will be applied to your cart automatically.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay, that's very easy. Thank you.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: You're very welcome. Thank you again for your service.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: ShopSphere, this is Maria. How may I assist?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I'm calling about order SS-TRACK-CHECK. I want to know where it is.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I can check the tracking for you. One moment... Okay, I see the last update was yesterday, showing it arrived at the sorting facility in your city.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: So it's close?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Very close! The next step is for it to be loaded onto a local delivery truck. It is scheduled and on track to be delivered to you tomorrow.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay, so it will be here tomorrow then?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Yes, that is the current and expected delivery date. You should see the tracking update to 'Out for Delivery' tomorrow morning.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Great, that's all I needed to know. Thank you.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: You're very welcome.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Zentron Support, this is Fatima speaking.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I just got my delivery, and you sent me the wrong item. It's completely wrong.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I am so sorry for that error. We will fix this immediately. Can I have your order number?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: ZN-NOT-MY-STUFF.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. I see you ordered a new keyboard. What did you receive instead?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: I received a yoga mat. I do not do yoga.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: That is definitely not a keyboard. I sincerely apologize for that warehouse mix-up. I am creating a new order for the correct keyboard right now, and I am sending it with our fastest shipping method.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay, thank you. What do you want me to do with this yoga mat?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: We will need that back. I've just emailed you a prepaid return label. You can just attach that to the box and drop it off at any post office.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: So I have to go to the post office because you guys messed up?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I understand it's an inconvenience, and I'm sorry. As an apology for the trouble of having to make the return, I have added a $15 credit to your Zentron account.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Oh. Okay, well, that's something. Thank you.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: You're welcome. Your new keyboard will be with you very soon.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: GloboMart Support. You're speaking with Ken.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I need to cancel order GM-BAD-IDEA-5. It was an impulse purchase.
