Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I understand. I can help you with that. Let me pull up the order... I see it's for the 'Pro-Gaming Chair'.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Yes, I just... I saw it and bought it without thinking. I can't really afford it right now.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I definitely understand wanting to stick to a budget. The order has not yet shipped. I have gone ahead and successfully cancelled it for you. Your card has not been charged, and you will receive a cancellation confirmation email.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: That's a relief. Thank you for handling it so quickly.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: You're very welcome. We hope you'll keep us in mind for a future purchase when the time is right.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: I will. Thanks again.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Have a great day.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: ShopSphere Customer Service. This is Priya. This call may be recorded.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I'm calling because I just saw an email about an order I didn't make. It looks like my account was hacked.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I'm very sorry to hear that. Let's get this sorted out immediately. What is your email address?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: It's hacked@email.com.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. I'm looking at your account now and I see the fraudulent order for a gift card. I am cancelling it right now. It has not been processed or sent. I am also voiding the charge on your card.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Oh thank goodness. This is so stressful.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I understand. I've locked the account to prevent any more activity. I've also removed the unauthorized email address they added. I'm now sending a secure password reset link to your real email. Please create a new, very strong password.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: I will. Is there anything else I need to do?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: After you log back in, I strongly recommend setting up two-factor authentication from the security settings page. It will make your account much more secure in the future.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay, I will do that. Thank you for your help.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: You're welcome. I'm glad we caught it in time.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Zentron, this is Ben speaking.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I'd like to get a receipt for my last order.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I can help with that. Do you have the order number?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: ZN-RECEIPT-PLZ.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. I see the order. I am resending the official invoice to your registered email address right now. It will be attached as a PDF.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Perfect, I just got it. Thanks for the quick help.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: You're welcome. Anything else I can do for you?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: No, that's all. Thank you.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: GloboMart, this is Fatima.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hello, I want to return a Christmas tree I bought from you.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I can look into that for you. May I have your order number?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: GM-XMAS-RETURN.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. Let me check the order date... I see this was delivered on December 5th.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Yes. We used it for Christmas, and now I want to return it.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I see. Sir, our return policy is for 30 days. It has now been over three months since the item was delivered. Also, our policy requires items to be in new, unused condition.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: It's in good condition! I put it back in the box. I want my money back.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I understand, but I cannot accept a return for a used, seasonal item that is several months outside of the return window. It is not eligible for a refund.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: This is ridiculous! I'm a loyal customer! Get me your supervisor!

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I can certainly transfer you, but I must inform you that they will not be able to override this policy. The request is significantly out of our guidelines.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: I'll be the judge of that. Transfer me.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Please hold.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: ShopSphere Support, you're with Emily.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I just placed an order and I completely forgot to put in my gift card number.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I'm sorry to hear you missed that. Let me see what I can do. Can I have your order number?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: SS-FORGOT-GIFT-CARD.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. Unfortunately, once an order is placed, I cannot go back and apply a new payment method like a gift card to it.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Oh no. So I can't use my gift card?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: You can definitely still use it. The order was just placed, so it hasn't shipped yet. The easiest solution is for me to cancel this order for you. Then you can immediately go back and place the order again, and remember to enter the gift card code this time.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Oh, okay. That's a bit of a pain, but it works. Please cancel it.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I know it's an extra step, and I apologize. I have now cancelled the order for you. You'll get an email shortly. The items will still be in your cart, ready for you to check out again.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay, I'll do that now. Thanks for your help.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: You're very welcome.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Zentron, this is David. How can I help you?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I would like to delete my account.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I can help with that. Can I have your email address, please?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: goodbye@zentron.com.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. We're sorry to see you go. May I ask for your reason, just for our feedback?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Your shipping is too slow. I ordered something last month and it took three weeks to arrive. I'm not doing that again.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I am so sorry to hear about that experience. That is well below our standard, and I will be looking into that previous order. I understand your decision. I have initiated the account deletion process. You will receive a final confirmation link in your email to complete the request.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay, thank you.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: You're welcome. My sincerest apologies again for the poor service you received.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: GloboMart Support, you're with Priya. This call may be recorded.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I have a charge from GloboMart on my credit card that I don't recognize. I haven't shopped with you in months.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I'm very sorry to hear that. Let's investigate this immediately. Can I have your name and the email associated with your account?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Sarah Connor, s.connor@email.com.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you, Sarah. I am checking your account... Oh my. I see an order was placed today for three drones, totaling over $2000, shipping to an address in Los Angeles.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: What?! That's not me! I live in Montana! That's fraud!

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Yes, it is. Please do not worry, we are going to take care of this. The order has not shipped. I am cancelling it right now and I am voiding the entire transaction. You will not be held responsible for this charge.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Oh, thank you, thank you. I was having a heart attack.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I understand. Your account has been compromised. I've locked it down and I'm sending a password reset link to your email. Please create a very strong, unique password. I also recommend you contact your bank to inform them of this fraudulent attempt.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: I will. Thank you so much for your help.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Of course. It's our top priority. I'm so sorry this happened.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: ShopSphere, this is Ken. How can I assist?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I'm trying to check out and it says my card is declined.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I'm sorry you're having trouble. Have you confirmed the card number, expiration, and CVV are all entered correctly?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Yes, I've tried it twice. I know the card is good.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: It's possible your bank has blocked the transaction for security reasons. It happens sometimes with online purchases. A quick call to them can usually resolve it.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: I'm not calling my bank. Can't you just push it through?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I'm afraid not. The decline comes directly from your bank, so we have no way to override it. It's their security system at work.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: This is ridiculous. I just want to buy a pair of socks.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I understand your frustration completely. Do you have another payment method you could try, like PayPal or a different card?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: No. This is the card I use. Forget it, I'll go somewhere else. This is too much trouble.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I'm very sorry for the inconvenience. The items will stay in your cart if you change your mind.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Don't hold your breath. (hangs up)

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Zentron. This is Fatima. This call may be recorded.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I just want to give some feedback. I'm visually impaired, and your website's new accessibility features are fantastic. The screen reader integration is so much better than it used to be.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: That is wonderful to hear! Thank you so much for taking the time to call and share that with us. Our accessibility team has been working very hard on those improvements.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Well, please tell them they did a great job. It has made shopping on your site so much easier and more pleasant for me.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I absolutely will. This is the best kind of feedback we can get. It really means a lot to the whole team to know their work is making a real difference.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: I'm glad. That's all I wanted to say. Keep up the great work.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you again for your call. Have a wonderful day!

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: GloboMart, you're speaking with Leo.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I ordered a set of pans, and one is missing from the box.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I'm very sorry about that. Can you tell me your order number?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: GM-MISSING-PAN.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. I see the order for the 10-piece cookware set. Which pan was missing?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: The small saucepan.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I apologize for that error. Unfortunately, the items are packaged as a complete set by the manufacturer, so we don't have individual pans to send out.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: So what can you do? I want the pan I paid for.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Of course. I can send you a complete, new 10-piece set. I've also emailed you a return label. If you could send the incomplete set back to us, we would appreciate it.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: So I have to box everything back up and take it to the post office?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I understand that's an inconvenience. As an apology for the error and the trouble of the return, I've added a $20 credit to your GloboMart account for a future purchase.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay. That's fair. Thank you.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: You're welcome. Your new, complete set will ship out today.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: ShopSphere Support, this is Aisha.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I want to return a blender I bought. It was delivered about two months ago.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I can look into that for you. Do you have the order number?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: SS-LATE-RETURN-9.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. I see the blender was delivered 65 days ago. May I ask why you're looking to return it now?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: I just never used it. It's still in the box, unopened. I just don't need it.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I understand. However, our return policy for change-of-mind is 30 days from delivery. I'm afraid we are well past that window and I can't process a return for a refund.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: But it's brand new! It's never been opened. You could just put it back on the shelf.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I understand your point, but the policy is firm on the 30-day timeframe for inventory and accounting purposes. Since it's still in new condition, I can make a one-time exception and offer you a store credit for the full purchase amount, minus the original shipping cost.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Store credit? I'd rather have the money back on my card.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I understand, but a refund is not possible for an out-of-policy return. The store credit is the best I am authorized to offer.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Sigh. Fine. I guess store credit is better than nothing. How do I do that?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I've just emailed you a special return label. Once we receive the blender back, I will manually apply the store credit to your account. You'll receive an email when it's available.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Zentron, this is Priya. How may I help?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I have a question about my tracking. It hasn't moved in a few days.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I can check on that for you. What's your order number?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: ZN-STALLED-OUT.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. Let me see... I see the last scan was three days ago showing 'Weather Delay'. There may be severe weather impacting the courier's transit hub or routes.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Oh, a weather delay? Is there any estimate for when it will start moving again?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: The courier doesn't provide a specific timeline for these delays, as it depends on when conditions are safe to resume operations. It is usually only a day or two. I would recommend keeping an eye on the tracking page for the next update.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay, so there's nothing to do but wait?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: That's correct. We have to wait for the courier to update the status. I am very sorry for this delay, but it is unfortunately out of our control.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: I understand. Can't fight mother nature. Thanks for checking.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: You're welcome. Hopefully, it will be on its way to you soon.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: GloboMart, this is Ben. This call may be recorded.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hello, I just received my order of two books, but one is the wrong one.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I'm sorry for the error. Can you give me the order number?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: GM-WRONG-BOOK-2.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. I see you ordered 'The Silent Patient' and 'The Guest List'. Which one was incorrect?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: 'The Guest List' was wrong. You sent me a cookbook instead.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: My sincerest apologies for that mix-up. I've created a new order to send you the correct book, 'The Guest List', and it will ship out today.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay, thank you. What do I do with the cookbook?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Please keep it with our compliments for the trouble we caused. No need to send it back.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Oh, okay. Well, thank you. I appreciate that.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: You're welcome. Your correct book will be with you soon.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: ShopSphere Support, you're with Emily.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I need to update the phone number on my account.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I can help you with that. Can you please confirm your email address to pull up the account?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: change.my.info@email.com.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. For security, I need to verify your identity. Can you confirm the billing zip code on file?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Perfect. What is the new phone number you would like to use?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay, I have updated the phone number on your profile. The change is effective immediately.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Great, that was easy. Thanks.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: You're welcome. Is there anything else I can help with?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: No, that's it. Bye.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Zentron, this is Leo. How can I help you?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hello, I just placed an order, and the charge was declined, but I know my card is good. I need to cancel it before it tries again and messes up my account.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I understand your concern. Let me look up the order. Do you have the number?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: It didn't give me one. My email is payment.fail@email.com.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. I see the attempted order. Because the payment failed, an official order was never actually created in our system. It's just sitting in a pending state.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: So you won't try to charge it again?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: No, our system won't retry a failed payment. The attempt is simply logged and abandoned. There's nothing you need to do, and nothing for me to cancel. You will not be charged.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Oh, that's a relief. Okay, great. Thanks for checking.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: You're very welcome. If you wanted to try the order again, I'd recommend contacting your bank first, as they are the ones who declined the charge.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: I will. Thanks.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: GloboMart, this is Fatima.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, your website keeps crashing every time I try to check out.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I'm very sorry to hear that. We have been experiencing some intermittent technical difficulties today. I apologize for the frustration.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: It's been three times. I get all the way to the end and it just gives me an error page.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I understand. Our technical team is working on a fix right now. If you'd like, I can try to place the order for you manually over the phone so you don't have to keep trying the website.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: You can just do it for me?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Yes. Can you tell me what items are in your cart?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: It's the 'GardenPro' trowel and a bag of potting soil.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay, I've added those to a new cart for you. I'll just need to get your credit card information to complete the purchase.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay. The card number is 4... (gives card info)

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. One moment... Great news, the order has been successfully placed. Your order number is GM-MANUAL-ORDER-1. You'll receive a confirmation email shortly.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Perfect. Thank you for your help. I was about to give up.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I'm so glad I could help you get it done. My apologies again for the website issues.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Zentron Support, this is Maria. This call may be recorded.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I just placed an order, and the charge on my card seems way too high.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I can certainly look into that for you. Can I have your order number?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: ZN-HIGH-CHARGE.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. I see your order for the garden hose. The item is $45. The total charged was $58. Is that what you see?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Yes! Why is it $13 more?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I see a $9 shipping fee for a bulky item, plus $4 in sales tax. That brings the total to $58. All of this was displayed on the final checkout screen before payment.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: I guess I didn't look closely. My mistake. Thanks for explaining.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: You're welcome. Happy to clarify.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: ShopSphere Support, you're with Leo.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I want to use my loyalty points on an order, but I don't see how.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I can help with that. The option is on the final payment page of checkout.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: I'm there, but I don't see it.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay, right near the gift card entry box, there should be a link or button that says 'Apply ShopSphere Points'. Have you found that?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Ah, yes, I see it now. It's smaller than I expected.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I can pass that feedback along. Once you click it, you should be able to apply your available balance to the order.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: It worked. Thank you.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: You're welcome. Enjoy the savings!

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: GloboMart, this is Priya. How can I help?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I ordered a set of 4 picture frames, but the box only had 3 inside.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I am so sorry about that packing error. Can I get your order number?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: GM-FRAME-SHORT.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. I see the order. I apologize that the set was incomplete. Since it's a pre-packaged set, I can't send you just the one frame.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: So what do I do? I need four.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I am sending you a brand new, complete set of four frames, which will ship out today. As for the incomplete set, please just keep them with our apologies for the mistake.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: So I get to keep the three, and you're sending four more?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: That's correct. It was our error, so we don't want to trouble you with a return.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Wow, that's amazing customer service. Thank you!

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: You're very welcome. Enjoy your frames!

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Zentron Support, you're with Emily.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I ordered a blue sweater, but I received a red one.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I'm sorry for that mix-up. We'll get the right one to you. Can I have your order number?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: ZN-COLOR-WRONG.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. I see the order for the blue sweater. My apologies. I've created an exchange order for the correct blue one, and it will ship out today with expedited shipping.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay, thank you. What about the red one?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I'm emailing you a prepaid return label now. You can just pop it in the mail when you have a chance.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Great, thanks for making it easy.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Of course. My apologies again for our error.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: ShopSphere Customer Service. This is Jessica.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I have a code for a free tote bag with a $50 purchase, but it's not working.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I can check on that for you. Is your cart total over $50 before taxes and shipping?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Yes, it's $62.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay. And have you also added the specific promotional tote bag to your cart? The coupon just makes that item free, it doesn't add it automatically.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Oh! No, I didn't. I thought it would just show up.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: That's a common point of confusion. If you go to the 'Promotions' page and add the 'ShopSphere Canvas Tote' to your cart, the code should then work and zero out the price of the bag.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay, let me try... I added it, and now I'm applying the code... It worked! Thank you.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Excellent! I'm glad we got that sorted for you. Enjoy your free tote!

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: GloboMart, this is Ken. How can I help you?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I just placed an order, and I'm having second thoughts. I think I want to cancel.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I can certainly look into that. What's the order number?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: GM-MAYBE-NOT.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. I see the order for the espresso machine. It's a fantastic model. Before I cancel, may I ask why you're having second thoughts?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: It's just a lot of money. It was an impulse buy. I probably shouldn't.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I understand completely. Just so you're aware, this particular item is eligible for our 6-month, no-interest payment plan. It would break the cost down to about $60 a month instead of one large payment. Would that make it more manageable for you?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: No, I think... I'm just going to hold off for now. Please go ahead and cancel it.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Not a problem at all. I have successfully cancelled the order. You will not be charged. Thank you for considering us.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you for being so understanding.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Zentron Support, this is Fatima speaking.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I'm trying to update my password, but it's not working.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I can help. Are you getting an error message?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Yes, it says my new password doesn't meet the requirements, but I don't know what they are.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I can clarify that for you. For your security, our passwords must be at least 8 characters long, contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number, and one special character, like a punctuation mark.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Oh, wow. Okay. I didn't have a special character.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: That's usually the one people miss! If you try again with a password that meets all those criteria, it should work for you.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay, let me try... Perfect, it worked this time. Thank you.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Excellent! Glad we could get it sorted.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: ShopSphere. This is Jessica. This call may be recorded.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I just got my order, SS-SHATTERED, and the glass bowl I ordered is in a million pieces.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Oh no, I am so incredibly sorry to hear that. That's a terrible way to receive a package. We will make this right for you immediately.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: I want a refund. I'm not risking getting another broken one.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I completely understand. I am processing a full refund for you right now. You do not need to do anything else. The money will be back on your card in 3-5 business days.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: And what about the box of broken glass?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Please, do not attempt to return it. For your safety, just carefully dispose of the entire package. There is no need to send it back to us.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay, thank you. I was really upset when I opened it.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I can only imagine. I've also added a $15 credit to your account as our apology for this dangerous and unacceptable error from the shipping department.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Oh, that's very kind. Thank you very much.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: You are most welcome. My sincerest apologies again.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: GloboMart, you're with Ben. How can I help?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I need to get a tracking number for my order.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I can get that for you. What is your order number?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: GM-WHERE-IS-TRACKING.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. Let me check... I see your order for the coffee maker. It looks like it is still being processed in our warehouse and has not yet been picked up by the courier.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: So it hasn't shipped yet? I ordered it three days ago.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I see that, and I do apologize for the processing delay. We've had a high volume of orders. I can see it is scheduled to be picked up this afternoon. A tracking number will be generated at that time and automatically emailed to you.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay, so I should get it today?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Yes, you will receive the email with the tracking link this evening. My apologies again that it's taking a bit longer than usual.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Alright. Thanks for checking on it.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: You're welcome.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Zentron, this is Emily. How can I help?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I just placed an order, and I entered the wrong zip code. It's supposed to be 90210, not 90211.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I can see if I can correct that for you. What's the order number?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: ZN-ZIP-FIX.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. Let me check the order... I see it's still processing. I should be able to edit that for you. One moment... Okay, I've updated the zip code to 90210.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Oh, that's great. Thank you.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: You're welcome. It's a good thing you called right away. Any later and it might have been too late to change.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: I'm glad I did. Thanks again for your help.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: My pleasure.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: ShopSphere. This is Mark speaking.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I need to know how many loyalty points I have.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I can look that up for you. What's your email address?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: points.user@email.com.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. You have 1,200 points available, which is a $12 discount, and you have another 500 points that are currently pending from your last order.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Why are some pending?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Points from a purchase remain pending until the 30-day return window for that item has closed. Then they become available for you to use.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Oh, I see. So I have $12 I can use now?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: That's correct.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay, that's all I needed. Thank you.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: You're welcome.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: GloboMart Support, you're with Leo. This call may be recorded.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I ordered a set of three travel bags, but only two were in the box.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I'm so sorry that your order was incomplete. Can I get your order number?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: GM-BAG-SHORT.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. I see the order for the 3-piece luggage set. I apologize that one was missing. Since they are sold as a set, I cannot send just the one missing bag.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: So what are my options?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I can send you a complete, brand new 3-piece set, and you can return the incomplete one. Or, I can offer you a partial refund of 33% of the purchase price if you'd like to just keep the two bags.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: I really need all three. Please send the new set.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Of course. I've placed the order for the replacement set, and it will ship today. I'm also emailing you a return label. Since it's a large item, you can schedule a free pickup with the courier so you don't have to take it anywhere.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Oh, a pickup is great. Thank you.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: You're welcome. My apologies for the error.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Zentron, this is Aisha.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I just got an email that my shipping address was changed, but I didn't change it.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Let's secure your account immediately. What is your email address?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: my.account@email.com.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. I have locked the account. I see a new address in a different state was just added. I am removing that unauthorized address now. Were any orders placed?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: I don't think so. I called as soon as I got the email.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Good. No, no new orders were placed. You caught it in time. I have sent a secure password reset link to your email. Please create a new, strong password to re-secure your account.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay, I will. That's so scary.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I understand. We recommend enabling two-factor authentication for the highest level of security.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: I'll do that right now. Thanks.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: You're welcome. Glad we could help.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: ShopSphere, you're with Priya. This call may be recorded.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I just received a dress, but the zipper is broken. It won't move at all.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I'm very sorry to hear that it arrived defective. Can I get your order number?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: SS-BAD-ZIPPER.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. I apologize for the quality issue. Would you like me to send you a replacement dress?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: I think I'd rather just have a refund. I'm worried another one might have the same problem.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I understand. A refund is no problem. I've initiated it for you. I'm also emailing you a free return label, as we do need the damaged dress back for our quality team to inspect.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay, I can send it back. Thank you for your help.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: You're welcome. The refund will be processed as soon as the return is in transit. My apologies again.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: GloboMart Support. This is Jessica.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hello, I just placed an order, and I put in the wrong quantity. I only need one, not two.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I can help with that. What is the order number?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: GM-TOO-MANY.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. I see the order for two lamps. It's still processing, so I can edit it for you. Would you like me to just change the quantity to one?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Yes, please. That would be perfect.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay, I've updated the quantity to one, and I've processed a refund for the second lamp. You'll get an updated order confirmation and a refund notification via email.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: That was easy. Thank you so much.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: You're welcome. Glad we could catch it!

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Zentron, this is Ken speaking.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I have a question about the 'Traveler's Backpack' on your site.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I can help with that. What would you like to know?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Does it have a padded sleeve for a laptop?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Yes, it does. It has a separate, padded compartment at the back that can fit up to a 15-inch laptop.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Great. And is it waterproof?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: The material itself is water-resistant, which means it will protect against light rain or splashes. It is not fully waterproof, so you wouldn't want to submerge it.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay, water-resistant is fine. That answers my questions. Thank you.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: You're very welcome.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: ShopSphere, this is Ben. This call may be recorded.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I bought a sweater two months ago, and the seam is already coming apart. I want to return it.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I'm sorry to hear about the quality issue. Can I have your order number?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: SS-BAD-SEAM.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. I see the order was delivered 70 days ago. I'm afraid our return window is 30 days, so I can't process a return for a refund.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: But it's falling apart! It's clearly a defective item. You should stand by your products.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I understand your frustration. While it is outside the return window, because it sounds like a manufacturing defect, I can offer you a store credit for 50% of the item's value.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Fifty percent? That's not good enough. It's a faulty product. I want a full refund.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I'm sorry, sir, but for an item this far outside the return period, a 50% store credit is the only exception I am authorized to make.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Then I want to speak to your manager. This is unacceptable.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I understand. Please hold one moment while I connect you.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: GloboMart, this is Jessica. How can I help?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I need to know how your returns work.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I can help with that. Are you wondering about the timeframe?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Yes, and if it costs anything.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Most items can be returned within 30 days of delivery for a full refund. And for most returns, we provide a free prepaid shipping label, so there is no cost to you.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Are there any items that can't be returned?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Yes, some items like personalized products, digital downloads, and items marked 'Final Sale' are not eligible for returns. It's always noted on the product page.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay, that's clear. Thank you.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: You're welcome.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Zentron, you're with Leo.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I want to delete my account.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I can do that for you. May I have your email address?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: delete.me@now.com.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. We're sorry to see you go. May I ask why you're closing your account?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: I just signed up for your emails and now I'm getting five a day. It's too much. I've tried unsubscribing and it didn't work.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I am so sorry to hear that. That is definitely not our intention and sounds like a system error. Instead of deleting your account, I can personally add you to our master suppression list to ensure you never receive another marketing email. Would you be willing to stay if I guarantee the emails will stop?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: You can guarantee it?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Yes, I am flagging your account now. I am also escalating the unsubscribe issue to our technical team. I apologize for the hassle.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay. Fine. Don't delete it. But if I get one more email, I'm calling back.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I understand completely. I've taken care of it. Thank you for giving us a chance to fix it.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: ShopSphere Support, this is Fatima speaking.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, my order, SS-STUCK, hasn't shipped yet. I ordered it four days ago.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I'm very sorry for the delay. Let me check on that for you... I see the order for the custom engraved watch band. Because this is a personalized item, there is a 3-5 day production time before it ships. It is currently in production and is scheduled to ship tomorrow.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Oh, I didn't realize it had a production time.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I apologize if that wasn't clear on the product page. It is on track to ship within the estimated timeframe. You'll receive a tracking email tomorrow evening.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay, that's fine. I just wanted to make sure it wasn't lost or forgotten.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Not at all! It's being carefully engraved for you as we speak.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Great, thank you.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: You're welcome.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you for calling Zentron support, Alex speaking. How may I assist?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I have a charge on my card for $99 from you guys, but I haven't bought anything recently.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I can certainly look into that for you. Can you tell me the email address on your Zentron account?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: It's user@email.com.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. I see the charge. It's for the automatic renewal of your Zentron Pro membership, which gives you free express shipping.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Oh, I completely forgot about that. I don't think I've even used it this year. Is there any way to get a refund?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Let me check for you... I can see that you haven't placed any orders that used the Pro shipping benefits since the renewal. Because of that, I can make an exception and refund the charge for you. I'll also cancel the membership so it doesn't happen again.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: You can? Oh, that's amazing. Thank you so much.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Of course. I've processed the refund. It will be back on your card in 3-5 business days.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: I really appreciate that. You've been a great help.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: ShopSphere, this is Maria. This call may be recorded.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, my tracking says my package is in my city, but it hasn't moved since yesterday morning. Is there a problem?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I can check the detailed tracking for you. What's your order number?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: SS-LOCAL-STALL.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. I see it arrived at the local delivery depot. It's very common for packages to be scanned upon arrival and then wait overnight for the driver to pick them up for their route the next morning. It should be out for delivery today.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: So it's not stuck?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: No, this is a normal part of the transit process. The next update you see should be 'Out for Delivery'. I'd expect it to arrive today or tomorrow at the latest.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay, that's good to know. Thank you for checking.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: You're very welcome.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: OmniBuy customer service, Leo speaking.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I just got an email saying I requested a password reset, but I didn't.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay, thank you for calling us immediately. Please do not click any links in that email. Let's secure your account. What is your email address?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: secure.me@email.com.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. I can see that several password reset requests were made in the last hour from an unrecognized IP address. This means someone knows your email and is trying to gain access.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: That's terrifying. Are they in my account?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: No, they have not been successful. Your current password is still secure. However, as a precaution, I highly recommend you change your password to something new and strong. It's also a very good idea to enable two-factor authentication for an extra layer of security.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay, I'll change it right now. How do I turn on the two-factor thing?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Once you're logged in, go to 'My Account', then 'Login & Security', and you'll see the option there. It's a simple setup process.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay, I will. Thanks for the help. That was scary.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: You did the right thing by calling. Your account is safe.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: NovaCart support, you're with Aisha.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I ordered some groceries for delivery and selected today, but now the delivery time has been pushed to tomorrow. I need to cancel, I won't be home.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I'm so sorry for that unexpected delay. I understand that's very inconvenient. Let me pull up your order. Can I have the number?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: NC-LATE-FOOD.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. I see the updated delivery time. Since the order has not yet been dispatched, I can cancel it for you right now.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Please do. And I'll get a full refund?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Yes, of course. I'm processing the cancellation... okay, it is confirmed. The order is cancelled, and the full amount will be refunded to your card. It should appear within 3-5 business days.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay, thank you for your help.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: You're welcome. I'm very sorry again for the scheduling issue.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Hello, you've reached Zentron. This is Chloe. How can I help?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I need an invoice for my last order, please.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Certainly. Do you have the order number handy?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Yes, it's ZN-INVOICE-PLS.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. I see your order for the coffee pods. I can resend the official invoice to your email right now.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Actually, can you send it to my work email? It's myname@company.com.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Not a problem. I've just sent the PDF invoice to that address for you.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: I just got it. Perfect. That was really fast. Thank you.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: You're very welcome. Is there anything else I can do for you?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Nope, that's all!

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: ShopSphere customer care, you're with David.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I'm trying to buy a sofa from you and I see an EMI option. Does that have any extra fees?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I can clarify that for you. For most of our partner banks, the 'No-Cost EMI' option has zero processing fees and zero interest. The price you see is the price you pay.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Most banks? Are there exceptions?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: A couple of smaller banks may charge a nominal processing fee on their end, but it would be clearly stated on the payment selection screen before you confirm your purchase. All major banks like Citibank, HDFC, and American Express are fee-free.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay, I use Citibank so that's good to hear. Thanks for the information.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: You're very welcome. It's a great way to make a large purchase more manageable.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you for calling OmniBuy. This is Priya. This call may be recorded.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I just got my new monitor from you and the screen is cracked right down the middle.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Oh no, I am so sorry to hear it arrived damaged. That's a terrible experience. Let's get this fixed for you right away. Do you have the order number?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: OM-CRACKED-SCREEN.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. I sincerely apologize for the poor handling during shipping. I'm sending out a brand new replacement monitor for you immediately, with our fastest shipping method.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay, thank you. What do I do with this broken one?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I've sent a return label to your email, but please, be very careful when repackaging it. We do need it back for our claim with the courier. For the inconvenience this has caused, I've also issued a $20 credit to your OmniBuy account.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Oh, okay. A credit is nice. Thank you.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Of course. Your new monitor should be with you in a day or two. My apologies again for this situation.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: NovaCart support, Leo speaking. This call may be recorded.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I received a gift from my registry that I'd like to return, but it's been a little over a month since the baby shower.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I can certainly look into that. We do have an extended return policy for baby registry items. Do you have the order number from the gift receipt?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Yes, it's NC-REGISTRY-GIFT.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. I see the item, the baby mobile. And I see it was purchased from your registry. For registry gifts, we offer a 90-day return window, so you are still well within that time frame.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Oh, 90 days! That's wonderful. I didn't know that.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Yes, we know things can get hectic with a new baby! I can process this return for you. Since it was a gift, the refund will be issued to you as a NovaCart e-gift card. Is that okay?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: A gift card is perfect. That's exactly what I wanted.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Excellent. I've sent the free return label to your email. Once we get the item back, the gift card will be emailed to you.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you so much, Leo.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: You're very welcome. Congratulations on the baby!

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: This is Zentron, Maria speaking. How can I assist?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I just bought a dress, but it doesn't fit right. Can I exchange it for a different size?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Of course. We can get that sorted for you. What is your order number?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: ZN-DRESS-SWAP.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. I see you ordered the floral maxi dress in a Medium. What size do you need?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: I need a Large.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay, let me check our inventory for the Large... Oh, I'm very sorry, it looks like the Large is completely sold out in that style.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Oh no, really? I love the dress.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I'm so sorry for the disappointment. Since we can't do an exchange, I can help you process a return for a full refund. I can email you a free return label.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay, I guess that's the only option. That's a shame.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I know. I'm sorry we didn't have the size you needed. The return label is on its way to your inbox now.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Alright. Thank you for your help.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: You're welcome.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: ShopSphere, you're with Ben. How can I help?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, I'm trying to use a discount code, but it keeps saying 'invalid'.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I can check on that for you. What's the code you're trying to use?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: It's VIP20.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay, the VIP20 code is a special promotion for members of our VIP loyalty tier. Let me check your account status... I see you're currently in our 'Insider' tier, which is one level below VIP.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Oh, so I can't use it?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I'm afraid not, this specific code is restricted to VIPs only. However, I can see you're very close to reaching the next tier. After this purchase, you'll be upgraded to VIP and will be eligible for all future promotions like this one.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: You're welcome. Sorry I couldn't apply that for you.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay, I've updated your primary shipping address to 987 Central Avenue. All future orders will default to this address.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. I see the order for the espresso machine. It's a fantastic model. The order is brand new, so I can cancel it. Are you absolutely sure?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Oh, thank you, thank you. You're a lifesaver.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: You're welcome. We're here if you change your mind later.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you for calling ShopSphere. My name is Aisha.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: SS-OOPS-CODE.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. And which code was it that you meant to use?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: WELCOME10.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay, I see your order and I can confirm that code is valid. Since the order is already complete, I'll just refund the discount amount back to your card.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: The 10% discount comes to $7.85. I've processed that refund for you now.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Great! Thanks for making that so easy.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: My pleasure. Enjoy your items!

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: We use a third-party service called ID.me to verify educator status. At the bottom of our website, there's a link for 'Educator Discounts'. It will guide you through the quick verification process.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: And that gives me a code for 15% off?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Once you're verified, the discount will be available in your account to apply at checkout. It's a reusable discount that you can use on eligible purchases throughout the year.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: That's even better. Thank you so much for this program.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: It's our pleasure. Thank you for what you do.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: OmniBuy customer service, this is Priya.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, what's my current point balance?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I can check that for you. What's the email on your account?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: balance.check@email.com.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. Let me see... I show you have a balance of 1,120 points.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Okay, so that's eleven dollars and twenty cents?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Exactly right. You can use that towards your next order.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Perfect, that's what I needed to know. Thank you.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: You're welcome.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you for calling NovaCart. You're with Ben.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: NC-BONUS-MISSING.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. I see your order for the skincare set. There was a '5x points on beauty' event running. Let me check the transaction log... you are absolutely right. It looks like a glitch only awarded you the standard points. I'm very sorry about that.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: I thought so. Can it be fixed?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Yes, right now. I am manually adding the 1,200 missing promotional points to your account... and... done. They should be visible now if you refresh your account page.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Of course. And my apologies that you had to call us to get it corrected.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: No problem. Thanks.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Zentron support, you're speaking with Chloe.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: When you're on the very last page, before you click to confirm the purchase, scroll down. Below your shipping and payment info, there will be a section for applying coupon codes and reward points.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: You'll want to type in the number of points you want to use. So if you want to use 1000 points, you would type '1000' in the box.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Got it. Thank you so much for your help.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: You're very welcome. Enjoy!

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: ShopSphere customer support. This is Ken.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I'm sorry about that oversight. I can look into it. Do you have the order number?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: SS-NO-SAMPLE.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. I see the 'Free Perfume Sample' on the order. My apologies, it seems our packing team missed it.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: I was really looking forward to trying it.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I understand. Unfortunately, we aren't able to ship promotional items like samples on their own. However, I want to make it right. I've added 500 loyalty points, which is a $5 credit, to your account as an apology.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Oh. Okay, a five dollar credit is nice. I can use that next time.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Exactly. I'm very sorry again that we couldn't include the sample for you.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: No problem. The credit is fair. Thank you.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: You're welcome.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Hello, OmniBuy customer support. You're with Maya.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: Hi, you guys sent me the completely wrong item. I ordered a blue dog collar, and I got a pink cat harness.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: I am so sorry for that very strange mix-up. Let's get the right item to you right away. Do you have the order number?

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you. I see the order for the blue dog collar. My sincerest apologies. The correct item is in stock, and I am sending it out to you now with expedited shipping.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: For our mistake, please don't worry about returning it. Perhaps you have a friend with a cat, or you could donate it to a local shelter.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: I can just keep it? Okay. Yeah, my neighbor has a cat. Thanks.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: You're very welcome. Your correct collar will be with you in a couple of days. Sorry again for the error.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
Transcript_Segments.text: No problem. Thanks for fixing it.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent
Transcript_Segments.text: Thank you for calling Zentron. You're with Chloe.

Transcript_Segments.text: Hello, I want to delete my account.

Transcript_Segments.speaker: agent

Transcript_Segments.speaker: customer
